btd6_battlecatboosterpack_sale Descripti: 30 Battle Cat powers. Five tier 3 Insta-Monkeys.
BattleCat Description: Bring Cringer from Masters of the Universe <sup>TM</sup> to the Bloon battlefield! Activate the transformation into Battle Cat for 4 rounds. Fully powered Battle Cat hits Bloons hard, also tearing away Camo property and Bloon immunities.
ABRCHIMPOPPABLEQuestDescriptionLong: CHIMPS Rules. Impoppable prices. Alternate Bloon Rounds. Is it even possible?
ABRCHIMPOPPABLEQuestVictoryScreen: You did it! You actually did it!
BattleCatQuest1Name: By the Power of Battle Cat!
BattleCatQuest1Description: We meowst hold back the Bloons!
BattleCatQuest1DescriptionLong: Dr. Monkey has noticed some unusual energy readings around Adora's Temple. Go and discover what Power awaits!
BattleCatQuest1UI1_1: We have seen many portals appear in our world in recent years, so after the Phayze Boss appeared I set up a network of energy sensors.
BattleCatQuest1UI1_2: Earlier today unusual readings were detected near Adora's Temple, so I rushed over to set up more sensors to triangulate the interference.
BattleCatQuest1UI1_3: I have done the calculations, and a rift will appear very soon. Something very powerful is coming our way.
BattleCatQuest1UI1_4: Unfortunately the Bloons seemed to have sensed it too and they're about to attack.
BattleCatQuest1UI1_5: Can you please manage the defenses while I gather more data?
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue1_1: The sensors are going crazy! Whatever is happening is happening fast, and it's even bigger than I thought!
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue1_2: The dimensional field lines are converging, like another Universe is approaching our own.
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue1_3: We can't stop it, but we can stop the Bloons from interfering!
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue1_4: Hold them off a little longer!
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue2_1: Did you see that! That was the crossover and... something with incredible power came through the portal!
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue2_2: Wait... is that a cat? Patch, do you speak cat?
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue2_3: On it, Doc. I'll get a Beast Handler to help.
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue2_3alt: On it, Doc. I'll ask a Beast Handler for help.
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue2_4: In the meantime, let's observe what this cat can do.
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue3_1: I don't understand these readings. Beast Handler, can you find out more from our feline friend?
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue3_1alt: I don't understand these readings. Ah, thank goodness a Beast Handler has given you their Tome of Tongues.
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue3_3: His name is Cringer, and he wants to help. His power comes from a place called Eternia, and it transforms him into Battle Cat.
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue3_4: Then he should do that now - there are tough Bloons on the way! Use that ability!
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue4_1: Ah, so after a few rounds using his power, another portal triggers and Battle Cat transports home.
BattleCatQuest1InGameDialogue4_2: But I have the right wavelengths now, so we can call Cringer back twice more to help defeat the rest of these Bloons.
BattleCatQuest1UI2_1: That was otherworldly - thank you, everyone! Now, what can I make of this data?
BattleCatQuest1UI2_2: We have the correct wavelengths to call on Cringer, but I can't get a reading on anything else. Still, the dimensional field lines connecting to Eternia are close.
BattleCatQuest1UI2_3: There can be no question. They will converge again.
RogueLegendQuest1Description: Get a glimpse of the Rogue Legends Campaign
RogueLegendQuest1VictoryScreen: You've completed the Rogue Legends Preview
RogueLegendQuestUI1_1: This is a preview of the Rogue Legends Campaign. You'll get a glimpse of a magical world, and a chance to play through a few tiles with your party of Monkeys.
RogueLegendQuestUI1_2: Every few rounds you will get a choice of a Boost. A new Insta Monkey to place, a buff to Monkey abilities, or powers to enhance your defense.
RogueLegendQuestUI2_1: Awesome, right! That was just a little glimpse of what the Rogue Legends Campaign is about. There are more maps, dozens of artifacts, Bosses, a merchant, a truly challenging campaign, and a nice camp fire to rest at.
RogueLegendQuestUI2_2: Buy the Rogue Legends DLC from the store to get the full experience!
DialogueRogueTileMapScreen1: This is the world of Rogue Legends. Everything here is being generated in real time.
DialogueRogueTileMapScreen2: Play a tile and see how you go.
DialogueRogueTileMapScreen3: You'll play three tiles in this preview.
TowerProjectileDruidChristmasDescription:
As the holidays approach, the Monkeys all cheer
For that is the time winter Druids appear.
With sharp little candies, and Christmas light vines,
This swap of projectiles is such a good time.
GameUIProfileAvatar103Description: When the snow starts falling, this Monkey gets crafting. But what to craft? An army of Snowmonkeys to scare away Bloons!  Limited Time Collector's Item!
GameUIProfileAvatar104Description: Cringer reminds us the big things often come in timid packages. Show this avatar to remind everyone that we all have the Power!
GameUIProfileAvatar105Description: The journey from roasting marshmallows to slaying a Boss can be only a few steps away. Each and every tile can help make you a Legend!
GameUIProfileAvatar106Description: Tales are told of this intrepid Monkey, whose Legend inspires others and causes even Boss Bloons to tremble in fear!
GameUIProfileAvatar107Description: A super exclusive avatar to celebrate your Golden drop! Red Sauda only appears for those who are truly worthy. Thank you so much for supporting the Bloons TD 6 toy line!
GameUIProfileBanner45Description: With lights, Monkeys playing, and an air of joyous wonderment. It's a magical time of the year! Limited Time Collector's Item!
GameUIProfileBanner46Description: With timidness turned to courage, Battle Cat strides confidently into the fray. Use this electrifying banner to inspire courage for your Monkeys and your Team's.
GameUIProfileBanner47Description: Tucked into a dusty chest in the attic, this small scrap of map was found - the map that would lead our roguish Monkey on so many legendary adventues!
GameUIProfileBanner48Description: The true mark of a legendary rogue - quietly roasting marshmallows at the campfire. Using the shredded remains of a Rogue Legends Boss as kindling, of course.
LegendsInfoDescription:
Welcome to Legends! Legends are DLC expansions of classic Bloons TD 6 play.

Each Legends brings new visuals, new challenges, and entirely new gameplay that intentionally push Bloons TD 6 in fun and dynamic directions. Thank you for being part of Legends!
LegendsPortalHome: Return to the base Bloons TD 6 experience.
LegendsPortalHomeDescription: Go back to the classic Bloons TD 6 experience. Leave your Legend here and pick it up at any time.
LegendsRogueInfoDescription:
Rogue Legends is a rogue-lite adventure across a huge variety of Bloon infested maps.

Build your Monkey Party and make strategic reward choices at key steps to advance. Win and Buy Artifacts to boost your Party's power and defeat the Boss!
LegendsRogueStoreDescription1:
Experience Rogue Legends for Bloons TD 6!

Set out on a nostalgic journey through amazing rogue-lite campaigns to find new companions, build your power, and defeat the final Boss. Infinitely and dynamically replayable!
LegendsRogueStoreDescription2:
• Detailed retro-inspired maps that immerse you in a nostalgic world of adventure
• All new rogue-lite gameplay that offers periodic choices between Insta-Monkeys, Artifacts, and Boosts to build your Party's power
• 60+ powerful Artifacts that fundamentally change classic play, such as zig-zag firing patterns or granting all projectiles homing ability
• All new Boosts with powerful rarities, some of which can buff all Monkeys
• Custom Bloon round sets for big changes in gameplay
• Collect Permanent Monkeys and Artifacts to add to your Party so each new Campaign offers evolving variety
LegendsRogueStoreDescription3:
• One Banner and Avatar set available immediately upon purchasing Rogue Legends
• A second Banner and Avatar set celebrating your legendary adventures after fully beating one Campaign
• All new Tim Haywood music track written exclusively for and inspired by Rogue Legends
LegendsRogueStoreShortDescription:
Explore new worlds

New rogue-lite gameplay

Dynamic, repeatable campaigns

AdoraTestQuest1DescriptionLong: Help Adora cleanse the Bloons on Chutes. With a little guidance from Patch!
AdoraTestQuest1VictoryScreen: Congratulations! You helped Adora to victory on Chutes!
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound1_1: Adora, I adore her! Even if she boasts about her connection to the Sun God a lot. Just between us, she's got a silly sense of humor when she isn't in battle. When fighting Bloons, though, she is serious business.
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound1_2: She's seriously powerful, too! And there is no denying Adora has a special connection to the Sun God. Almost as if the Sun itself shines through her, as she puts it.
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound1_3: Adora shoots magical projectiles that seek their targets. She really is fascinating!
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound2_1: Wow, that was impressive! It really does seem like her power comes from her connection to the Sun.
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound2_2: According to Adora, her level 3 ability, The Long Arm of Light, greatly focuses that connection, granting her a short, intense burst of power.
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound2_3: Not only does the ability significantly increase her range and pierce, but also allows her magical bolts to pop Purple Bloons, completely searing through their immunity!
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound2_4: Use The Long Arm of Light on this round to pop the stream of incoming Purple Bloons.
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound3_1: The Sun God sure approves of Adora. As she levels up she starts shooting more Divine Bolts that do more damage.
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound3_2: Being the High Priestess of the Sun God has its perks!
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound4_1: At level 7 Adora gets the Blood Sacrifice ability. I mean, of course there's no actual blood involved. She told me she named it that to scare the Bloons, but there was no shortage of concern around the village until every monkey understood what was actually going on.
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound4_2: When activated, Blood Sacrifice allows you to target a Monkey, sending the Monkey to a temporary solar dimension where they help channel the power of the Sun, mostly in beach chairs. In exchange, Adora is granted a temporary increase to her attack range and attack rate, as well as a huge boost of XP based on the cash that's gone into the Monkey and its upgrades.
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound4_3: Use Blood Sacrifice on this round to clear the next wave. Combine it with The Long Arm of Light to get a glimpse of the sort of power Adora can wield when her connection to the Sun God is at its peak.
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound5_1: An extradimensional pocket of sunshine sounds like a really nice place to vacation!
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound5_2: But there's no time to think about taking a holiday... there are Bloons incoming!
DialogueAdoraTestQuest1InGameOnRound5_3: Adora's level 10 ability, Ball of Light, allows Adora to summon a shimmering sphere of pure light and energy. This ephemeral sphere does huge damage while it exists, putting to rest any doubt the Bloons might have about the true power of the Sun God.
RogueLegendsInfoSubtitle: Welcome to Rogue Legends for Bloons TD 6
RogueLegendsInfoSectionOne: Start a Campaign with any Unlocked Hero.
RogueLegendsInfoSectionTwo: Each Hero Skin has a custom loadout that will start your Party - two Monkeys and one Artifact.
RogueLegendsInfoSectionThree: Use your Party to beat each tile. There are no Continues - if you lose the tile you lose a Heart.
RogueLegendsInfoSectionFour: You can replenish some Hearts by Healing at a Camp Fire. Other choices at the Camp Fire include Recruiting a new Monkey, Mentoring an existing Monkey in your party, or Enhancing one of your Artifacts.
RogueLegendsInfoSectionFive: You will get to pick Temporary Boosts to use during tiles. You will get options for Permanent Artifacts and Insta Monkeys when you win special tiles or when you find Loot.
RogueLegendsInfoSectionSix: Complete Rogue Legends Feats to upgrade a unique badge for your Player Profile. Earn an exclusive banner for beating one campaign.
RogueLegendsInfoSectionSeven: If you lose all your Hearts your Campaign is over and you must start again. Good luck and happy adventuring!
RogueRulesSubtitle: A helpful guide to aid you on your journey
RogueRulesSpawn: This is where you Click to spawn.
RogueRulesRest: Camp Fire! Recruit a new Monkey to your Party, Mentor a Monkey in your Party, Enhance an Artifact, or Heal some Hearts.
RogueRulesMerchant: Merchant! Trade Artifacts and Tokens with the Merchant.
RogueRulesLegendaryTile: Legendary Augment! These sparkles represent this tile has been enhanced with Legendary power.
RogueRulesRestartJourney: Restart Campaign to begin your Journey again.
RogueRulesFinalBoss: Final Boss! You have won many battles, but can you complete the journey?
RogueRulesMiniBoss: Mini Boss! Challenge a Boss to earn great loot.
RogueRulesBonusLoot: Loot Chest! Open the chest and there could be some Artifacts to choose from.
RogueRulesWaterBridge: A Log Bridge allows you to cross narrow waterways.
RogueRulesBloonEncounter: Bloons in your way must be cleared. Stronger Bloons indicate the Bloon Encounter has a special modifier.
RogueRulesMiniGame: Mini Games! A variety of challenges. Beat the Goal to earn a reward.
RogueRulesCompass: Click to go back to Rogue Monkey. Swaps between Spawn point on maps that have more than one.
RogueRulesWisp: Click the Wisp to follow the path.
RogueRulesArtifacts:
Artifacts and Boosts enhance your Monkeys to help fight the Bloons. Though some numbers may appear small, it all adds up. Extraordinary power can be unlocked when combining multiple Artifacts.
Note: Ability Cooldowns are capped at 70% faster.

RogueFeat18Description: Collect a permanent copy of 60 Artifacts
RogueFeat19Description: Claim a Legendary rarity version of each of the 3 Boost types (one of each Precision, Inspiration, Quickening)

Loot.LegendsUnlock.Title: Rogue Legends!
RogueCHIMPSInfo: Unlock by beating 4 stages in a campaign
Rogue Hint 1: Looks like lots of Bloons are headed this way! Popping them gives cash to purchase Towers, Boosts and Upgrades!
Rogue Hint 4: Black and White Bloons! Black Bloons float right through explosions, White Bloons aren't affected by ice attacks!
Rogue Hint 5: Camo Bloons... Not all Monkeys are gifted with the ability to see these Bloons.
Rogue Hint 6: Purples and Leads! What pops one doesn't always pop the other, a true defense test.
Rogue Hint 8: Fortified Lead Bloons! They sure look tough, even tougher than normal Lead Bloons.
Rogue Hint 9: Two Ceramics. You'll need some good damage output to pop them.
Rogue Hint 16: How strategic of those Lead Bloons to escort the MOAB
Rogue Hint 22: 3 MOABs and a BFB walk onto the path. This isn't a joke.
Rogue Hint 25: A round full of colorful Camo Bloons? What's the point of having so many colors if you can't see them.
Rogue Hint 28: Rogue Legends is awesome. Life is awesome too. Don't forget to have a break sometimes and do something else. Then play more Rogue Legends!
Rogue Hint 30: ZOMG! Surely there isn't anything larger!
Rogue Hint 33: DDT's you say... Next round you say...
Rogue Hint 45: What is that large purple thing in the distance?
Rogue Hint 46: That is one BAD looking Bloon...

PowersInfoSubtitle: Single use items to give you a boost in-game when most needed.
PowersInfoBody:
• Add with Monkey Money
• Or Top Up in store
• Special Powers available to purchase in the store
PowersProInfoBody:
• Single use items that require Monkey Money to use
• Unlock by purchasing and using the regular power. E.g. buy or use Banana Farmers to gain XP to unlock Banana Farmer Pro
• Upgrade placed Power Pro using in-game cash
• Unlock higher level upgrades by buying Power and using Power Pro in-game. Tier 1s unlocked automatically
InstaMonkeysInfoSubtitle: Single use Monkeys of a specific upgrade to use in-game
InstaMonkeysInfoBody:
• Earn Insta Monkeys as rewards in different game modes across Bloons TD 6
• Insta Monkeys available in packs in the store
• Collect Insta Monkeys and fill your collection (Insta Monkeys will remain visible in your Collection even after use.)
BananaFarmerProPower Description: Pro Banana Farmer farms bananas like a pro with increased range and collection speed.
Banana Vacuum Description: Banana Farmers have more range and collect bananas faster.
Camo Bananas Description: Banana Farmer can see previously unseen Camo Bananas.
Adaptive Workers Description: Additional Adaptive Banana Farmers increase sell value of Banana Farms in radius.
Banana Peels Description: Collected Bananas occasionally drop peels to blowback Bloons & remove Regrow.
Regrow Bananas Description: Banana Farmer can target a Banana Farm to produce Regrow Bananas occasionally.
Monkey Banker Description: Increases Bank income in radius and collects Bank money when full.
Robo Farmer Description: Gathers all your Bananas, from everywhere!
Banana Intelligence Bureau Description: All Banana Farms in radius occasionally produce Regrow and Camo Bananas. Targeted Farm always produces Regrow Bananas.
Banana Financier Description: Increase debt but automatically invest cash in empty Monkey Banks.
SuperMonkeyBeaconPower Description: A placeable Super Monkey Beacon with a Beacon Storm ability on a long cooldown.
Charged Beacon Description: Monkey Beacon can store up to 5 Beacon Storm ability charges. Replenish 4 charges instantly with Monkey Money.
Mini Stormcaller Description: Beacon Storm ability cooldown is much faster but does less damage.
High Impact Description: Beacon Storm ability does more damage.
Storm Tremors Description: A moment after activating the Beacon Storm ability, a second storm triggers at half power.
Rapid Recharge Description: Beacon Storm ability cooldown reduced even further.
Bewildering Storm Description: Beacon Storm ability stuns surviving MOABs for a short time.
Reverberation Description: A third storm triggers after the second. Secondary and tertiary storm are stronger rather than weaker.
Beacon of Legends Description: Beacon gains a permanent turret that attacks like a base Super Monkey & grants free Super Monkeys every several rounds.
Piercing Wind Description: Storm damage soaks through Bloon layers, and Beacon's damage increases permanently every time it is used.
btd6_legendsfrontier Description: Get access to Frontier Legends + Banners and Avatars
btd6_legendsfrontier_sale Description: Get access to Frontier Legends + Banners and Avatars
SuperMonkeyBeacon Description: A placeable Super Monkey Beacon with a Beacon Storm ability on a long cooldown.
FirecrackerGwendolinSkinDescription: Celebrate anything and everything with Firecracker Gwen's fireworks!
ChallengeZOMGRushDescription: A ZOMG spawns at the start. Each time you pop it a new one appears!
ChallengeZOMGRushDescriptionLong: Rounds 30 - 60. Rounds start automatically. Get 500 cash every 4 seconds. Respawning ZOMG!
ChallengeSupportOnlyDescription: Take down the Bloons with Support Monkeys only!
ChallengeSupportOnlyDescriptionLong: Bazaar on Impoppable settings. Only Support Monkeys are available.
ChallengeSupportOnlyVictory: Well done! You beat Bazaar with Support Monkeys only!
ChallengeTargetMonkeysDescription: For this Quest, Monkeys shoot where you aim!
ChallengeTargetMonkeysDescriptionLong: Rounds 3 - 35 with the Rogue Legends round set, and the Follow Me Artifact that makes these Monkeys follow input targeting like Dartling Gunners. 1 of each Monkey.
ChallengeTargetMonkeysVictory: Your impressive targeting took down the Bloons! Great job!
WinXWithNoMoreThanYMonkeys: Win {0} using no more than {1} Monkeys
WinXGamesWithNoMonkeysHigherThanYTier: Win {0} games using Monkeys no higher than Tier {1}
BeatNormalOdysseyByNK: Beat a Normal Odyssey made by Ninja Kiwi
SubmitABossEventScore: Submit a score for a Boss event
NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This information is only used to track performance of external ads. We do not store or sell this information.
TeamsBanner1Description: Do you see that giant floating banana bunch too?!
TeamsBanner2Description: By their powers combined, it's super hero team up time!
TeamsBanner4Description: We shall black out the sun with our shurikens!
TeamsBanner6Description: Lord over other Monkey Teams with this awesome CT banner.
TeamsEmblemFrame5Description: A seriously cool frame for your seriously cool Team!
TeamsEmblemFrame6Description: Time to turn up the heat on your opponents!
TeamsEmblemFrame8Description: Make your Team stand out from the rest with this funky all natural frame.
TeamsEmblemFrame9Description: Careful planning, measuring and execution are the keys to victory!
TeamsEmblemIcon5Description: Avast me hearties, set sail and plunder the territories!
TeamsEmblemIcon6Description: Strike fear into the hearts of MOABs everywhere.
TeamsEmblemIcon7Description: Silent but deadly strikes are the hallmark of Teams with this icon.
TeamsEmblemIcon8Description: Brew up a storm with this awesome Team icon.
TeamsEmblemIcon9Description: This is Gwen's offering towards Team icons. I mean we shouldn't be surprised at this point should we? It's fire.
TeamsEmblemIcon10Description: Quincy's patented homing arrows, now in iconic form!
TeamsEmblemIcon11Description: See the forest AND the trees with this eco-friendly icon.
TeamsEmblemIcon12Description: Mr. flaming hot knuckle bones gives the thumbs up to your epic Team!
BuildingPropWizardTowerDescription: Magical adventure awaits any team capable of funding this mystical base. [Main Building Slot]
BuildingPropLighthouseDescription: Light the way for your whole team with this brightly lit main base. [Main Building Slot]
FlyingPropPhoenixDescription: Everyone wonders if it's actually a Wizard Monkey up there, but has anyone considered that maybe all Wizard Monkeys are just Phoenixes waiting to be reborn? [Air Slot]
FlyingPropMiniAceDescription: Let Monkey Ace watch over the skies for your team with this adorable mini-Ace. [Air Slot]
WaterPropKrakenDescription: Release the Kraken! Dominate the waves with this surprisingly cute giant undersea creature. [Water Slot]
WaterPropMiniSubDescription: Periscopes up! Scout out the area with the Mini-sub. [Water Slot]
BasePropKingDescription: Welcome to our awesome new Monkey Ci... I mean Contested Territory! This land is up for grabs and infested with Bloons! Pop them and secure the land for your team. [Island Slot]
BasePropLighthouseKeeperDescription: This wise old monkey tends the lighthouse and is always on the lookout for ships passing in the night. [Island Slot]
BasePropCrashedMoabDescription: A team of crack monkey scientists have already combed this wreckage for useful tech, so now it just lies there as a warning to other Bloons. [Island Slot]
BasePropTrainingDummyDescription: Keep all your Dart Monkeys on their toes with a Dr. Monkey certified 100% re-usable Training Dummy! [Island Slot]
BasePropCampfireDescription: Keep your team warm on chilly nights, or tell spooky stories about Contested Territories of yore next to the Campfire. [Island Slot]
BasePropTotemDescription: Protect your borders with this fearsome looking Tribal Totem. [Island Slot]
BasePropSatelliteDescription: Beam information directly down from space with this mobile satellite vehicle, ready to roll! [Island Slot]
BasePropTortoiseDescription: Don't ask him if he has any tribal relatives, especially not turtles! [Island Slot]
BasePropBattleMonkeyDescription: Contested Territory monkey, ready to go! [Island Slot]
BuildingPropBattleTowerDescription: Any adventure into Contested Territory needs a solid base. [Main Building Slot]
TeamsBanner13Description: Churchill slays with his gift-jump trick. It's a silly Christmas for the Bloons TD 6 Heroes.
TeamsEmblemFrame21Description: A resplendent Christmas bow for the most cheerful Team on the board.
TeamsEmblemIcon24Description: What has this cookie seen..? And why is it so cute?
TeamsEmblemIcon25Description: An icon for the Team that will Jingle all the way to victory.
FlyingPropCardinalDescription: A colorful Christmas Cardinal to fly around your base. Dropping messages of... joy! [Air Slot]
TeamsBanner15Description: Success comes to the Team that works together!
BasePropPicnicBasketDescription: While you wait to take more tiles, or just need a break, settle down for a nice picnic with your Team! [Island Slot]

RaftDefenseQuest1Description: No water Monkeys and no land placement
RaftDefenseQuest1DescriptionLong: No water Monkeys and no land placement on Spice Islands. Build on the raft to stop the Bloons!
MoonColonyQuest1DescriptionLong: The Monkeys are adding some green to the drab gray Moon. Use the transformed layout to defeat the Bloons!
ProjectileCarouselQuestDescription: Defeat the Bloons with a Projectile Carousel!
ProjectileCarouselQuestDescriptionLong: Whimsical magic or quantum entanglement? Not even Dr. Monkey knows! Monkey projectiles are randomly switched with the projectiles of any other placed Monkey. Plus! Projectiles last longer and will bounce off the edge of the map. Results include fun and awesomeness!
SheRaQuestDescription: Scoop is gone! Who can save him?
SheRaQuestDescriptionLong: Scoop was taken by the Bloons! Patch only knows he was last seen at Adora's Temple. Go there and see if you can find anything.
SheRaQuest1VictoryScreen: Scoop wasn't there, but She-Ra is here to help!
SheRaQuest2VictoryScreen: No luck finding Scoop. She-Ra's quest continues!
SheRaQuest3Description: Scoop must be at Dark Castle!
SheRaQuest3VictoryScreen: With the help of She-Ra, Scoop has been saved!
ChallengeOneHeroQuestDescription: Beat the Rogue Legends rounds with a One Monkey Army
ChallengeOneHeroQuestDescriptionLong: One Monkey Army Artifact + other buff Artifacts and supporting Monkeys. With One Monkey Army, your Hero counts as all tower categories, deals 2x damage, and can see camo. They won't earn XP though so you will need to buy Hero level ups with in-game cash. Non-Hero Monkeys deal no hit damage.
DesperadoQuestDescription: The Desperados are here! Time for introductions
DesperadoQuest1VictoryScreen: Introductions are over, now for a challenge!
DesperadoQuest2VictoryScreen: You took down the Bloons on Sunset Gulch!
EziliTestQuest1DescriptionLong: Curse the Bloons on Carved. With a little guidance from Patch!
ChallengeBloonHackersDescriptionLong: The Bloons are stealing cash and using it to spawn extra Bloons through a portal. Only 1 of each tower. Benjamin is already there, so take another Hero and stop the Bloon hackers on Cracked!
ExperimentRegularIncomeDescription: Beat Dark Path with a regular income!
ExperimentRegularIncomeDescriptionLong:
You won't earn any cash from popping Bloons, but get 10 cash every second. Only 1 of each tower.

NOTE: High level Monkey Knowledge recommended.
ExperimentRegularIncomeVictoryScreen: Well done! You beat Regular Income!
SkeletorQuestDescription: Skeletor is up to no good!
SkeletorQuest2Description: He thinks he can control the Bloons!
SkeletorQuest3Description: We should help him, even though he definitely won't help us!
SkeletorQuest3Victory: Skeletor gathered a mountain of cash! Will someone be able to stop him before it's too late?
SilasTestQuestDescriptionLong: Help Silas freeze the Bloons on Frozen Over. With a little guidance from Patch!
SilasTestQuestVictoryScreen: Congratulations! You helped Silas to victory on Frozen Over!
SheRaQuestIntroDialogue_1: Oh no! Scoop was doing some "investigative journalism," and he's gone!
SheRaQuestIntroDialogue_2: All I found was his satchel. Its contents strewn across the ground.
SheRaQuestIntroDialogue_3: Last I heard he was snooping around Adora's Temple.
SheRaQuestIntroDialogue_4: The Bloons must have taken him.
SheRaQuestIntroDialogue_5: Can you have a look around the Temple?
SheRaQuestStage1IntroDialogue_1: Doctor Monkey, what's wrong? You almost knocked me over!
SheRaQuestStage1IntroDialogue_2: There's about to be another Awesome Convergence Event!
SheRaQuestStage1R4Dialogue_4: Nice to meet you She-Ra, I'm Patch. How did you get here?
SheRaQuestStage1R4Dialogue_5: I was wondering the same thing, Patch.
SheRaQuestStage1R4Dialogue_7: Our friend Scoop is gone! I think the Bloons took him and, well, he's not a fighter.
SheRaQuestStage1R4Dialogue_8: We need to save him but I don't know where he is.
SheRaQuestStage1R4Dialogue_10: Very well! Leave it to me. I'll stop these 'Bloons', find Scoop, and save the day!
SheRaQuestStage1R4Dialogue_12: I'll pop back when it's a little less dangerous.
SheRaQuestStage1R4Dialogue_13: It appears this is a day for new friends.
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_2: These 'Bloons' are worthy foes. While mindless troopers, their strategy is to overwhelm.
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_3: I grow stronger though, and if we work together I'm sure we will succeed.
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_5: Only problem is... the 'Bloons' don't leave footprints...
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_6: I don't know how to find your friend Scoop.
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_8: Good news, everyone! Scoop must have his camera with him - my MonkeyGadgetFinder managed to give us a location.
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_9: At least his location a few hours...
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_12: This is She-Ra. She appeared when the dimensions converged again.
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_13: She has graciously offered to help rescue Scoop.
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_14: Hello, Doctor Monkey. I am She-Ra!!!!!!
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_15: Ah, excuse me - it's a habit. Can you describe this location you mention?
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_16: Quite alright. Here, I'll show you.
SheRaQuestStage2IntroDialogue_18: Thank you, Doctor Monkey, Patch. I must hurry to save your friend!
SheRaQuestStage3IntroDialogue_1: The Bloon horde on Downstream has been vanquished, scattered to the winds.
SheRaQuestStage3IntroDialogue_3: The Bloons do not retreat. I tried to let some escape to follow them back to their base but they seem to have no sense of self-preservation.
SheRaQuestStage3IntroDialogue_5: Indeed. We've tried the same thing before, to no avail.
SheRaQuestStage3IntroDialogue_6: It's a bit worrying but I'm optimistic about our...
SheRaQuestStage3IntroDialogue_7: Wait, Scoop's camera has just connected.
SheRaQuestStage3IntroDialogue_8: He's at Dark Castle right now!
SheRaQuestStage3IntroDialogue_9: Your magic is powerful, Doctor, and seems more precise than some magic from my home.
SheRaQuestStage3IntroDialogue_10: That's not magic, She-Ra. That's science!
SheRaQuestStage3IntroDialogue_12: There's no time Doctor Monkey. Scoop needs my help!
SheRaQuestStage3GameDialogue_1: Scoop must be in that flimsy looking box. Patch was right, he's not a fighter.
SheRaQuestStage3GameDialogue_2: Who's there? Did someone say Patch?
SheRaQuestStage3GameDialogue_3: For the Honor of Grayskull. I am She-Ra!
SheRaQuestStage3GameDialogue_4: Patch requested my aid. I am here to rescue you, Scoop.
SheRaQuestStage3GameDialogue_5: But first I must defeat the Bloons that have imprisoned you.
SheRaQuestCompleteDialogue_1: I'm home! Thank you, She-Ra. That battle sounded impressive from inside my box.
SheRaQuestCompleteDialogue_2: You're welcome, Scoop. Our worlds connected for a reason. I will always help those in need.
DesperadoQuest1IntroDialogue_1: Well howdy there friend! Come on, gather round. There's a Desperado in town!
DesperadoQuest1IntroDialogue_2: Desperado starts with a pistol, and each path improves Desperado's weaponry. Dual six shot revolvers on the top path, a long range rifle on mid, or powerful shotgun on bottom path.
DesperadoQuest1IntroDialogue_3: Watch that Desperado clean up round one and then let me tell you a little about this rootin' tootin' Monkey!
DesperadoQuest1Round2Dialogue_1: At lower levels Desperado can only shoot one Bloon at a time, so it's important to maximize the conditional speed buffs at low tier upgrades. Placing Desperado far away from Bloons, without other Monkeys in range, or where there will be a lot of Bloons in range depending on the upgrades of each Desperado.
DesperadoQuest1Round2Dialogue_2: Desperado gains camo detection with the first middle path upgrade but needs tier 3 on the middle path to deal with Lead Bloons. Bottom path Desperado might not like being around other Monkeys, but still needs their support.
DesperadoQuest1EndDialogue_1: That's enough target practice. Word is a posse of Bloons are approaching Sunset Gulch to destroy the bridge!
DesperadoQuest1EndDialogue_2: Go and meet the Desperados to help clean up the riff raff!
DesperadoQuest2IntroDialogue_1: The Bloons are fast approaching, you got here just in time! Upgrade the Desperado close to the track to 0-0-3 in order to take down the Bloons.
DesperadoQuest2IntroUpgrade_1: When Desperado has a second weapon they get two ranges. One for the pistol and another for the second weapon. That Desperado will pull out a powerful shotgun when Bloons are close.
DesperadoQuest2Round2Dialogue_1: Lead Bloons are about to come out but that middle path Desperado can't see the track! Upgrade it to 0-3-0 and watch as the powerful long range rifle blasts the Lead Bloons!
DesperadoQuest2Round3Dialogue_1: Nicely done! There's still a lot of Bloons on the way to destroy the bridge. Don't let them get too far or all of this will be for nothing.
SpikeFactory Paragon Description: A factory of explosive spike Bloon annihilation.
BombShooter Paragon Description: Cluster explosions, anti-MOAB explosions, Bloon stunning explosions, knockback explosions. BOMB has it all!
IceMonkey Paragon Description: As the eternal frost descends and cold reigns supreme, even the baddest of Bloons are helpless against its icy grasp.
EziliTestQuestDialogue1_1: Ooh this place is scary. I'm glad we're here with Ezili. She's so powerful and little! How could you not feel safe with Ezili around?
EziliTestQuestDialogue1_2: Ezili wields dark magic to curse Bloons. Cursed Bloons are damaged over time and nearby Bloons are damaged when the curse is applied.
EziliTestQuestDialogue1_3: If there are lots of spaced Bloons, especially fast ones, Ezili can have trouble. But her powerful curse is still awesome!
EziliTestQuestDialogue2_1: Ezili can Curse Bloons through walls, and as she levels up she gets more range, attack speed, and begins cursing multiple Bloons at once.
EziliTestQuestDialogue2_2: Ezili can pop Camo and Lead Bloons, making her a very useful Hero as long as you have other Monkeys to make up for her slower attack speed.
EziliTestQuestDialogue3_1: At level 3 Ezili gets the Heartstopper ability. When activated, Bloons can't regrow and Purple Bloons are vulnerable to all attacks.
EziliTestQuestDialogue3_2: Activate Heartstopper on this round when the Purples come out.
EziliTestQuestDialogue4_1: Ezili's level 7 ability is Sacrificial Totem. This places a totem on the map that gives nearby monkeys Camo detection, extra pierce, range, attack speed, and projectile speed (especially to Wizards).
EziliTestQuestDialogue4_2: Using the totem drains lives. 10 at first, but only 1 at level 16.
EziliTestQuestDialogue4_3: Activate Sacrificial Totem on this round to destroy the Bloon wave.
EziliTestQuestDialogue5_1: At level 10 Ezili gets the MOAB Hex ability. This places a powerful Curse on a MOAB-class Bloon and uses Ezili's target priority to pick the target. Hexed MOABs take damage every second until annihilated and release no children when destroyed.
EziliTestQuestDialogue5_2: If there is another MOAB-class Bloon around when the Hexed MOAB is destroyed, the Hex will transfer to the next MOAB.
EziliTestQuestDialogue5_3: Activate MOAB Hex on this round once the BFBs are in range of the Wizard Monkey and watch them all go up in magical smoke!
EziliTestQuestDialogue6_1: Now place some more Monkeys and finish off the rest of the rounds!
SilasTestQuestDialogue1_1: Let me introduce Silas. He's one cool cat! Or should I say Monkey?
SilasTestQuestDialogue1_2: Silas uses a special form of magical ice to attack the Bloons. He can be placed on land or water, see Camo Bloons from level 1, and boosts ice attacks of other Monkeys.
SilasTestQuestDialogue1_3: The first hit won't damage a Bloon, but apply what's called a Rime debuff. This slows them down and will make them take more damage from ice attacks.
SilasTestQuestDialogue1_4: That means when Silas hits a Rimed Bloon, the Bloon will take damage and be frozen!
SilasTestQuestDialogue1_5: Then when that Bloon is hit again, it will release a burst of icy iceness, doing even more damage!
SilasTestQuestDialogue2_1: At level 2, Ice Monkeys in Silas' range create orbiting Ice Projectiles when they attack. Just a few at first, but more as Silas Levels up.
SilasTestQuestDialogue2_2: Silas' level 3 ability Frostbite allows Silas to hit white Bloons and detonates frozen Bloons when hit.
SilasTestQuestDialogue2_3: See this in action on this round, and use the ability to destroy all the White Bloons!
SilasTestQuestDialogue3_1: Silas gets abilities at almost every level. You can learn about all the little extras by reading the upgrades screen for Silas. But here I'll take you over some of the bigger powers.
SilasTestQuestDialogue3_2: At level 4 Silas creates Ice Walls on the track nearby. These push back and freeze Bloons that can be frozen.
SilasTestQuestDialogue3_3: And at level 6 Silas can use the range of Ice Monkeys to attack.
SilasTestQuestDialogue3_4: Watch that in action on the next round!
SilasTestQuestDialogue4_1: Level 7 ability, Frozen Cascade. When activated, Silas releases an icy explosion around himself, then Ice Monkeys release an icy explosion spreading out from Silas.
SilasTestQuestDialogue4_2: On the next round, wait till the Bloons are in range of the last Ice Monkey and then use Silas' level 7 ability.
SilasTestQuestDialogue5_1: Level 10 ability, Frozen Burial, freezes and damages all Bloons, with extra damage to already frozen Bloons. Then Ice Walls are created along the path.
SilasTestQuestDialogue5_2: Use this ability on the next round to clear the bloons!
SilasTestQuestDialogue6_1: There's a lot of depth to Silas! And remember, some Mermonkey and Druid upgrades also have ice attacks!
SilasTestQuestDialogue6_2: Place some more Monkeys and finish the rest of the rounds!
FrontierLegendQuestUI1_1: Yeeehaaa! This is a trial of the Frontier Legends DLC for Bloons TD 6!
FrontierLegendQuestUI1_2: Take the role of Sheriff. Help a monkey in trouble, save Sandytown from a Bloon attack and become the Sheriff. The full DLC has a huge story and an expansive world to explore. This is just a little taste of something incredible.
UpdatePopupDescription49:
New Desperado Tower!
• A new Primary Monkey strolls into town! Desperado is a gunslinging Monkey that always has a pistol holstered and ready. Dual wield revolvers, add a rifle for long range work, or a short range shotgun for blastin' Bloons.
• A Tales Quest to introduce Desperado, and a Challenge Quest for any Hero, with the One Monkey Army Artifact from Rogue Legends!
• New Advanced map, Sunset Gulch. A high Bloon path spanning a gulch with a railway track that the MOABs follow.
• Plus balance changes, QoL improvements, Trophy Store Cosmetics and more!
UpdatePopupDescription50:
Cool Ice Hero!
• Introducing Silas, a new Hero commanding the power of Ice. Freeze Bloons and buff ice attacks.
• New Intermediate map, Lost Crevasse.
• Powers Pro! Super Monkey Beacon and Banana Farmer Pro. Placeable powers with 3 upgrade paths.
• Plus balance changes, quality of life improvements, Trophy Store Cosmetics and more!
UpdatePopupDescription51:
Bomb Shooter Paragon!
• Experience a whole new level of explodey with the Ballistic Obliteration Missile Bunker!
• Discover the value of Bananite on the new Easy map, Three Mines 'Round!
• Rule over all of the Bloons with new Skeletor Skin for Obyn!
• Plus new Quests, balance changes, quality of life improvements, Trophy Store Cosmetics and more!
UpdatePopupDescription52:
Frontier Legends!
• Experience Frontier Legends! A story-driven Bloons TD 6 experience set on the Monkey Frontier
• Freeze the Bloons with the Ice Monkey Paragon!
• Run down the Bloons on the new Expert map, Tricky Tracks!
• Plus new Quests, balance changes, quality of life improvements, Trophy Store Cosmetics and more!
UpdatePopupDescription53:
New Year Update!
• New Gwendolin skin, Firecracker Gwen! Bring in all the new years in style with sparkly explosions!
• Catch the Bloons on parade on the new Advanced map, Party Parade!
• Plus new Quests, balance changes, quality of life improvements, Trophy Store Cosmetics and more!
SkelobynQuest1Dialogue1_4: Why am I in the middle of nowhere? Why is there no friendly monkey to greet me? Why am I a monkey?
SkelobynQuest1Dialogue2_1: When these squeaky Bloons get past I lose lives. My magic is different here. I need to pop these puffed up polymer pouches.
SkelobynQuest1Dialogue2_2: Ahhhhh! More are coming. If I summon a Tek Trap that should stop them.
SkelobynQuest1Dialogue3_2: My Havoc Staff! Those Bloons won't know what hit them!
SkelobynQuest1Dialogue4_1: Pop Bloons, get cash? With enough wealth I can raise an unstoppable horde of my own!
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue1_1: Yes, yes! This is the place!
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue1_2: Magnificent color palette, and the perfect place to set a trap for the Bloons.
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue1_3: Let me just clear this rubbish.
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue2_1: I need some powerful Monkeys. These vengeful Druids seem inspired to help with an ambush.
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue3_1: All they lack is a little motivation! Bwahahahaha
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue4_1: Now just a little drama for more popping power. Hehehehe...
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue4_2: Oh no, these Bloons are too strong. Isn't there anyone to help us!?
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue5_2: Me? Why nothing. I'm assisting these Monkeys in hopes they can return me to Eternia is all.
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue5_3: I think my magic can generate power from these Bloons, enough to create a portal home. We need to pop more - will you help?
SkelobynQuest3Dialogue1_1: This is the ideal place to enact my plan. I can use the ancient magic of this place to pop even more Bloons.
SkelobynQuest3Dialogue1_3: Yes, yes. What else would I get from popping them?
SkelobynQuest3Dialogue1_5: Along with the ancient magic here, I have found other artifacts from this world to boost our power.
SkelobynQuest3Dialogue1_6: Druids will grow steadily stronger and your attacks will have a chance to draw great power from these Monkeys' Sun God.
SkelobynQuest3Dialogue1_8: Don't get used to it. I just want to get back to Eternia.
SkelobynQuest3DialogueWin_1: Yes, a mountain of marvelous money. I shall secret this at Snake Mountain and return for more.
SkelobynQuest3DialogueWin_2: He-Man won't realize the strength of my army until it's too late - Eternia shall be mine!
SkelobynQuest3DialogueLose_2: My plan is ruined! I must try again.
SkelobynQuest2Dialogue5_1: Look what the portals dragged in. What are you up to Skeletor?
SkelobynQuest3Dialogue1_2: Your plan is to gather power from the Bloons to create a portal?
SkelobynQuest3Dialogue1_4: Very well, Skeletor. I will help you create the portal.
SkelobynQuest3Dialogue1_7: These powers will be useful, Skeletor. You're being unusually helpful.
SkelobynQuest3DialogueLose_1: Skeletor was trying to trick us! Luckily he hasn't gathered enough cash!
SweepstakesPrizeContents: Each prize pack contains everything displayed. Winners will get one of everything!
LegendsFrontierInfoDescription:
Frontier Legends is a story based campaign adventure out in the wild frontiers of Monkey civilization. You are Sheriff, the new Sheriff of Sandytown. Help defend against the Wild Bloon invasion and track down the Diamondback Boss threatening the entire Frontier.

You and your posse need to work with a cast of Monkey characters to defeat the Bloons and protect your new home in Sandytown.
LegendsFrontierStoreDescription1:
Experience Frontier Legends for Bloons TD 6!

Become the new Sheriff of Sandytown in this story-based campaign adventure and work with a cast of Monkey characters to defeat the Bloons and protect Sandytown.
LegendsFrontierStoreDescription2:
• Expansive, detailed open 3D world set in the Monkey frontier
• Hire a posse of individual Monkeys with unique traits to defend against the invading Wild Bloons
• Equip the Sheriff with hats, outfits, and primary weapon to aid your exploration and Posse in battle
• Six all new Bloons to figure out and pop plus the fearsome Diamondback Boss
• Go fishing, buy helpful items and equipment from the General Store, and find all the hidden secrets of the world
• Join an eclectic cast of Monkey characters and go on a heartwarming, comically serious adventure on the Monkey frontier!
LegendsFrontierStoreDescription3:
• One Banner and Avatar set available immediately upon purchasing Frontier Legends
• Unlock more cosmetics by completing Frontier Legends feats
• All new Tim Haywood music track written exclusively for and inspired by Frontier Legends
LegendsFrontierStoreShortDescription:
Become the new Sheriff

Explore the expansive, detailed 3D world of the Monkey frontier

Story driven campaign with a fantastic cast of Monkey characters
FrontierItemUnlockInfo: Unlock by completing the Frontier Legends campaign

FrontierSparklesTutorial: Click to show sparkle trail to destination
FrontierTravelTutorial: Click the arrow to travel Sandytown
HomesteadFullPopup: You have no more space in your Homestead! Let some Monkeys go or expand your Homestead with a new wing from the General Store.
SheriffUnlockInQuest: Unlock this item during the Frontier Campaign
SheriffUnlockInWorld: Unlock this item by finding it on the Frontier
SheriffUnlockGeneric: Unlock this item on the Frontier, through the campaign or finding special chests

Desperado saloon unlock: Desperado may now appear in Saloon
