GiddyUpAbility: The Sheriff uses his morale to boost the attack speed of Monkeys. Posse uses more Stamina while Giddy Up is active.
DiamondbackInfoPanelDescription:
• Diamondback has multiple segments and regularly spits Bloons forwards on the track.
• Diamondback's head blocks projectiles from piercing through to its body.
• The Rattle Tail is shielded from damage, break through the shield to stun and debuff Diamondback temporarily!
• Diamondback releases Diamond Bloons that only take 1 damage at a time.
• When each skull is reached, Diamondback sheds a middle segment, spawns many Bloons and regenerates the Rattle Tail shield.
FrontierLegendsInfoSectionOne: You are the new sheriff of Sandytown. Your quest starts in Boulder Rapids, where you respond to the calls of a Monkey in trouble.
FrontierLegendsInfoSectionTwo: Follow the Quests to advance through the Frontier Legends campaign story, defeat the Wild Bloons threatening Sandytown, and get revenge for the destruction of your former town.
FrontierLegendsInfoSectionThree: Gather Monkeys to fill your Posse, hire more in the Saloon, and get items and other upgrades from the General Store.
FrontierLegendsInfoSectionFour: Upgrade Monkeys and Heroes, buy items and equipment for your Sheriff. Earn Bananite currency from Battles, obvious and hidden chests, Bananite outcrops, or by fishing at one of the many fishing spots spread throughout the Frontier.
FrontierLegendsInfoSectionFive: Monkeys have Stamina that is used when they are placed and for each round played. Restore Stamina by resting at a campfire, or return to your Homestead for the fastest Stamina recovery. Swap out Posse members low on Stamina with fresh Ranch Hands.
FrontierLegendsInfoSectionSix: Upgrades for Monkeys (and Heroes) are permanent. Higher level Monkeys use more Stamina.
FrontierLegendsInfoSectionSeven: Roaming Bloons in the campaign world might flee or chase you. Wild Bloons will reinforce the waves of Bloons during a Battle. Boss Bloons are hidden in their lairs, though the Sheriff knows that one in particular will have to be faced in the end.
FrontierLegendsInfoSectionNine: Team up with Monkeys to fight the Bloons, help out and team up with a cast of Monkeys that call the Frontier their home. Frontier Legends is the first full campaign story game made in the Bloons TD franchise.
FrontierLegendsInfoSectionTen: There is much to explore and discover on the Frontier. We hope you enjoy the world and the story we have crafted. Thank you!
FrontierRules1: To move around, Click or hold on the ground to move to that point.
FrontierRules2: Click the Sparkles button on the active Quest to show a sparkling trail to guide you.
FrontierRules3: Click the Campfire button to show a trail to the nearest Campfire.
FrontierRules4: You move faster on the main path. Long grass and snow slow you down.
FrontierRules5: You can have up to 6 Posse members at a time. They use Stamina when placed and each round fought. Stamina can be replenished by resting at a campfire, and your Homestead has the fastest Stamina recovery rate.
FrontierRules6: You can switch out Posse members, change Sheriff equipment, and change your pet at your Homestead or any Campfire.  Swap out Posse members low on Stamina with fresh Ranch Hands.
FrontierRules7: Your currency, Bananite, is carried throughout all the Frontier and in Battle. Upgrades for Monkeys and Heroes are permanent. Higher level Monkeys use more Stamina.
FrontierRules8: Roaming Bloons might flee, or chase you. Beat them in a duel for Bananite, or sacrifice stamina if you lose or flee.
FrontierRules9: During a Battle, Bloon Reinforcements with Wild Bloons will be announced. These special Bloons have properties that help other Bloons or hinder your Monkeys. Different strategies will be required to defeat them.
FrontierRules10: The Sheriff has an ability to use in Battles. Giddy Up uses Sheriff Morale to boost your Posse, using more stamina but increasing their ability to pop Bloons.
FrontierCampaignCompleteBody:
Thank you for protecting the Frontier and making it a lil' safer for your Monkey Friends.

All levels have been upgraded to their Elite versions, so if you want to save even more Monkeyfolks while getting a few black borders along the way, we encourage you to give it a shot!

Best of luck and happy trails!
SetFrontierNameDesc: Give your Posse member a nickname
StuckFrontierBody: Set Sheriff back to Sandytown campfire?
DeleteFrontierBody: Are you sure? This will wipe all of your current campaign progress.
ft_dynamitebloondescription: Dynamite Bloons become unstable after taking enough damage and will explode if not popped. The explosion will damage other Bloons and also stun nearby Monkeys. Dynamite Bloons take extra damage from fire and explosion damage. When popped releases 2 Black Bloons and 3 Regrow Red Bloons.
ft_glassbloondescription: Glass Bloons are immune to energy and plasma attacks. Projectiles that can't damage the Bloon bounce off. When popped releases 1 Camo Zebra Bloon and 1 Regrow Zebra Bloon.
ft_diamondbloondescription: Diamond Bloons only take 1 damage from any projectile, and they reduce the pierce of projectiles hitting the Bloon by 5. They are immune to all movement impairment. When popped releases 1 Fortified Ceramic Bloon.
ft_aurabloondescription: Aura Bloons radiate a Bloon buffing field. Bloons within the aura move faster. When popped releases 3 of each Red, Blue, Green, Yellow & Pink Bloons.
ft_retributionbloondescription: Retribution Bloons are immune to getting slowed. Every few hits, the Retribution Bloon will momentarily stun the attacking Monkey. When the Bloon is destroyed, the Monkey that finished it off is stunned for a few seconds. When popped releases 4 Yellow Bloons and 2 Purple Bloons.
ft_ringleaderbloondescription: Ringleader Bloons project a barrier that absorbes all pierce from projectiles that hit it. Projectiles hitting the barrier damage it. When the barrier is destroyed it will restore after several seconds. While the barrier is active, Bloons inside have their speed capped. When popped releases 3 Rainbow Bloons.
ft_sheriffplaceddescription: Sheriff's ability, Giddy Up, uses Sheriff's Morale to boost the attack speed of Monkeys but makes them use more Stamina. You can see Sheriff's Morale and Monkey Stamina on the sidebar.
ft_lowstaminadescription: Your Monkeys use stamina in battle and are now low. They will attack slower until they spend some time to rest at a campsite or back at the Homestead. At 0% stamina they won't be able to be deployed in battle at all!
AllMonkeysRecruitedDescription: You've recruited all the Monkeys in the Saloon. Wait for more to come in or refresh with Bananite.
FrontierPurchaseContinueBody:
Your purchase means a lot for the development of games here at Ninja Kiwi!
You have unlocked the full version of Frontier Legends and you can continue from here.
You can collect your quest reward upon exiting.
Have fun wranglin' those Bloons partner!
FrontierLegendsInfoSubtitle: Welcome to Frontier Legends for Bloons TD 6
FrontierRulesSubtitle: A helpful guide to succeed on the Frontier
FrontierCampaignCompleteSubtitle: You defeated Diamondback and saved Sandytown!
FrontierPurchaseContinueSubtitle: You can continue your Frontier Legends campaign!
FrontierTryDescription: Play the introduction of Frontier Legends.
ThanksForTryingFrontierDescription: Well done, pardner! You completed the trial, but the Frontier still needs a Sheriff like you to save the day! Unlock the full Frontier Legends DLC for a lot more fun!
TowerPetDesperadoArmadilloDescription: Armadillo the armadillo, decendent of the pet armadillo of a Monkey whose name is what he was.
TEAMPU-SnowflakesDescription: Warm banana milk, building snowmonkeys, a puff of snow. It's the little things. Limited Time Collector's Item!
BloonsAllBloonsWinterHatDescription: 100% Cotton. Gentle warm wash only. Not recommended for White or Zebra Bloons.
BloonsAllBloonsPopsWesternDescription: Bang! Peow! Tzing! Don't let them Bloons forget you're the fastest dartslinger in the West
CoopEmoteTextHowdyDescription: Look! I'm Sheriff! Howdy howdy howdy!
CoopEmoteAnimationYeehawDescription: Before you do this, make sure you Preehaw.
GameUIProfileAvatar117Description: Get ready to hit the dusty ol' trail and become the legendary hero of the Frontier!
GameUIProfileAvatar118Description: The name's Sheriff. I reckon you don't need to worry 'bout that Diamondback no more.
GameUIProfileAvatar119Description: Monkeys love a good snow day, and you never know what's going to happen on the slopes!
GameUIProfileBanner57Description: Totally hooked on fishing? Reel-y can't get enough? This banner is sure to catch your attention.
GameUIProfileBanner58Description: Wanted: Popped or Alive - and we both know how this ends!
GameUIProfileBanner59Description: Can't you just hear the Bloons singing, "Have yourself a Merry Little Christmas..."
UIMusic-FrontierMainDescription: The Main Theme of Frontier Legends
FrontierDefeat: The Bloons are overpowering. You hurry back to safety, dropping Bananite on the way.
DismissDesc: End employment? This cannot be undone.
TryAgainDesc: Whoops, you missed! But here's some good news, Sheriff: you get a second shot!
QuickdrawTutorialDesc: Press the Shoot button when the line reaches the target
QuickDrawLost: Your Posse lost {0}% of their Stamina!
FishingTutorialDesc: Press the Reel In button to keep the fish on the hook!
RestDescription: Change the time of day for a fresh look at the Frontier. Beware the roaming Bloons at night. This does not refresh Stamina.
FrontierChestNeedKeys: You need {0}! Buy keys from the General Store or wanderin' Bloons have a chance to drop them.
RemoveMonkeyFromHomesteadDesc: Are you sure? This will permanently remove the Monkey from your Homestead.
NotEnoughBananiteDesc: Earn Bananite from winning Battles, poppin' wanderin' Bloons, fishin', or finding it on the Frontier.
ExtraStoolDesc: An extra stool for the Saloon, expanding your options for new Posse hires.
HomesteadWestWingDesc: Fix up a room so you can recruit 10 more Monkeys. (Does not expand Posse size)
HomesteadEastWingDesc: Fix up a room so you can recruit 20 more Monkeys. (Does not expand Posse size)
FavoredTradesDesc: Using your gift of the gab, you talk the shop keeper into giving you an exclusive Sheriffs only discount at the Saloon.
GhostTrailDesc: Wandering Bloons take 30% longer to detect you
UnseenTrailDesc: Wandering Bloons take 10% longer to detect you
StaminaPotion Description: Recover 25% Stamina for your entire Posse to a maximum of 80%.
GreatFishingRodDesc: A better fishing rod capable of catching rarer fish.
LegendaryFishingRodDesc: A legendary fishing rod capable of capturing the rarest fish.
NewBootsDesc: Bet you could kick up some dust with these puppies.
chestKeyDesc: An old key that can be used to open a chest. Looks like it'll break after one use.
FakeWalletDesc: Bloons will take this instead of Stamina and Bananite to avoid a Quick Draw.
High Noon SuitDesc: Bloons in radius of the Sheriff move slower. Giddy Up slows Bloons even more.
FuturisticSpectaclesDesc: Allows Sheriff and Monkeys in radius to target Camo Bloons. Giddy Up gives bonus damage to Camo Bloons.
HatAndStacheDesc: Monkeys in Sheriff radius are more effective against MOAB and Boss Bloons.
MassiveStacheDesc: Your charisma and luscious moustache earn you 10% extra Bananite from all sources.
TinFoilHatDesc: Giddy Up allows Monkeys in Sheriff radius to ignore Bloon damage immunities and stamina costs are reduced 10%
GunBeltDesc: The Sheriff attacks faster with his equipped weapon.
WaderOutfitDesc: Fishing Minigames are easier. Monkey projectiles have a chance to release fishy fish and water monkeys can be placed on land near the Sheriff.
OldHatDesc: It's had a few tumbles through the dirt but it does the job.
Old PonchoDesc: Worn but warm. Has a nice drape to it.
No HatDesc: Get some sun on ya head.
BoomerangPistolDesc: Throwable pistol that flies back to the Sheriff.
ZigZagPistolDesc: Pistol shoots in a zig zag pattern, good for hittin' all the Bloons.
WaveyWaterPistolDesc: Water Pistol that shoots in watery waves.
MarshmallowStickDesc: Flick burning marshmallows at the Bloons.
GreenHatDesc: Abilities trigger automatically. Abilities in Sheriff radius cooldown 15% faster.
BlueBowlHatDesc: Sheriff and Monkeys in radius have extra range. Monkeys in radius have 25% faster projectile speed.
TinyStacheDesc: All projectiles bounce off map borders and blocking objects. Projectiles have 10% more lifespan.
LeadStacheDesc: Sheriff attacks have a chance to release a flame burst, burning up to 60 Bloons and negating Lead immunity for 6s.
TargetGlassesDesc: Sheriff's projectiles have a 5% chance to  Crit for 5x damage. Crit chance increases the further away the target is. Projectiles gain slight homing.
GoldenHatDesc: Divine Intervention for Sheriff and Posse. 1 in 1000 chance to call upon the Sun God to smite Bloons for 100x damage.
BlackTinfoilHatDesc: All stamina costs reduced 5%. When Sheriff or Posse members retreat, create explosion that damages nearby Bloons.
GlueSplatterPonchoDesc: Posse explodes burning Bloons by popping with fire damage. Posse explodes glued Bloons by popping with explosive damage. Sheriff has chance to apply glue on hit.
GoldenGunBeltDesc: Sheriff gains +35% range, and damage increased 50%
SnowyPonchoDesc: Sheriff and Posse deal 25% more damage to Bloons that are Frozen, Glued, or Stunned. Freeze duration of Posse in Sheriff radius increased by 50%. Water around Sheriff can freeze for Monkey placement.
RedGunBeltDesc: Sheriff projectiles move slower, but spin, able to hit targets multiple times. Sheriff projectiles get +200% pierce.
camoRegrowAnglerDesc: Doesn't look like anything to me.
camoRegrowAngler_shinyDesc: Doesn't look like anything to me.
commissionedPineappleDesc: A dangerous pineapple from the war times.
commissionedPineapple_shinyDesc: A dangerous pineapple from the war times.
ddtSharkDesc: Giving Monkeys Thalassophobia since ages ago.
ddtShark_shinyDesc: Giving Monkeys Thalassophobia since ages ago.
junkDesc: One Monkey's junk is also another Monkey's junk.
junk_shinyDesc: One Monkey's junk is also another Monkey's junk.
leadPufferFishDesc: Puffed up lead makes no sense.
leadPufferFish_shinyDesc: Puffed up lead makes no sense.
monkeFishDesc: No such thing as a fish.
monkeFish_shinyDesc: No such thing as a fish.
oldBuckleDesc: Polish it up, good for smart-casual dinner parties.
redBloonFishDesc: Just a regular Red Bloon Fish.
redBloonFish_shinyDesc: Just a SHINY Red Bloon Fish.
rustyDartDesc: Who knows what Bloons have been popped by this bad boy.
rustyDart_shinyDesc: Who knows what Bloons have been popped by this bad boy.
tire_shinyDesc: Makes the wheel go round. With bling!
trueSunCodDesc: Glory to the True Sun Cod.
trueSunCod_shinyDesc: The most truest of the Sun Cods.
FrontierFeat101Description: Clear the Underground Cave of Bloons
FrontierFeat102Description: Find the Tunnel in the Crypts
FrontierFeat103Description: Pop each new Frontier Bloon type ...
FrontierFeat104Description: Clear the campaign by defeating Diamondback
FrontierFeat105Description: Win a total of 100 Bloons Quickdraw events across all campaigns
FrontierFeat107Description: Walk a total of 100,000 tiles across all campaigns
FrontierFeat108Description: Hire a total of 1000 Saloon-goers across all campaigns
FrontierFeat109Description: Spend a total of 100,000 gold in the General Store
FrontierFeat110Description: Hire 5 Legendary Mercenaries across all campaigns
FrontierFeat111Description: Collect every fish on the frontier, including junk!
RetreatNoStaminaWarningDescription: Monkeys with no Stamina can't be placed. Are you sure you want to retreat them?
FrontierLegendQuest1Description: Take a gander at the Frontier Legends campaign
FrontierFeat102: Found My Feet, Earnin' My Keep
chickenGame_1: A lot of chickens 'round, I should get them back to their coops!
RocksForBedrolls_1: Gah, my bedroll’s feelin’ like rocks. When was the last time I slept in a proper bunk anyhow?
RocksForBedrolls_3: Ah well, it’s nothin’ a quick walk won’t fix I s'pose.
MonkeyFound0_1: Let’s see what’s on the other side of this creek.
Surprised2b_2: Listen, see that grass behind ya?
Surprised2b_4: Walk back into that, and it won’t be able to see ya.
Surprised3_2: Whatcha doin’ out on the Frontier in the middle of the night?
Surprised3_8: Sure can, the Frontier’s no match for me! And I wouldn't say no to a banana cookie for my troubles.
BlockedPath2_4: Hold your horses, you said they explode?
BlockedPath2_5: Then how ‘bout we use ‘em to blow up the rubble? I’ll lure it over and blast it when it's close enough.
AmbushInSandyTown_6: Wait, what about those banana cookies?
AmbushInSandyTown3_1: Do you need some help back there?
AmbushInSandyTown3_5: Then shouldn’t we all go help?
AmbushInSandyTown4_1: He's just over there eating! Guess I'll deal with this, then I’m going straight back to camp.
TownIsSaved_3: You two weren’t so bad yourselves.
TownIsSaved2_2: Can you swallow that first? I can barely understand you, mister.
TownIsSaved2_8: Ads? Hired? My name’s Sheriff. My parents weren’t very inventive.
TownIsSaved3_2: Hey! Wait! What are you talking about?  Ah, he’s gone. Scout, what just happened?
TownIsSaved3_4: Well, sure. And a little something to wash it down. That Monkey mentioned something about a Saloon. I’m gonna get a cactus juice.
LeftBehind_9: That’s awful nice of ya but I don’t remember agre-
LeftBehind_12: That’s very nice an’ all, Mr Mayor, but I never agreed to-
LeftBehind2_2: Well, I could use that cactus juice.
TheSaloon_3: Sounds worth a look, but I'm not planning any adventures.
TheSaloon_5: You aren't the best listener are you?
TheGeneralStore_2: So I can spend Bananite here, too?
TheGeneralStore_4: And will I be receivin’ much of it as the new Sheriff?
TheGeneralStore2_1: I could hightail it outta here. But these folks do need the help, that's sure as shootin’.
WatersOfSandytown_2: Well, fine, considerin' I've been appointed Sheriff of a town I just stumbled into.
WatersOfSandytown_4: Right, so any second now I'm gonna feel inspired to catch a fish I take it?
WatersOfSandytown_7: Shouldn't I be fightin' Bloons or somethin'?
WatersOfSandytown_9: I lived in the Frontier up until this mornin'…
FishingHole_1: Well, here's the fishin' hole. I might as well catch a few. The Bananite’ll come in handy, and it is mighty relaxin’.
FishingDone_2: You sounded more interested in the Bananite to me.
FishingDone3_2: Mr Mayor sure is an interesting character.
FishingDone3_6: Sure can. I mean, apparently it's my job now.
DirkQuickshot2_6: Sounds like we’ve got some Bloons to be poppin’!
Campfire_5: Say, I could use a sit down. We've been on our feet for a while.
Campfire2_2: Uh, I’ll pretend I understood all that. Is fast travel like being on a stagecoach?
CampfireAmbush_1: So, you don't live in Sandytown?
CampfireAmbush_3: So you work more like a mercenary for hire?
AlongTheRidge_4: Are they headed toward town? Sounds like at least two packs of ‘em.
BackAlongTheRidge_2: More like on the float, since they don't have legs.
ClearedTheRidge_3: I’m almost positive we're the same age.
ClearedTheRidge2_5: Sure, when I’m ready I'll head up and meet you and Dirk at Sunset Gulch. Hopefully he doesn't quickshot me by accident!
OldRailroad_2: Wouldn’t miss these legendary views. Howdy, Dirk.
OldRailroad_5: For sure. We’ll watch your back Scout.
ALittleFurther_1: Find what you were looking for, Scout?
ALittleFurther_5: Hey, that actually sounded all heroic.
FindAnything3_2: I’m not one to comment on names.
ResortSaved_1: Looks like everyone’s alright. Maybe just a few scratches here and there.
BloonTracking_2: Wouldn’t that just make it a weed?
BloonTracking6_1: She figured that out just by smelling the air?
Streambed_4: Tiptoein’ around leaves ain’t for me. Bloons I can handle.
HazelTracking3_2: You can figure that out by eating dirt!?
HazelTracking3_5: I ate mudpies as an infant, does that count?
APattern_3: Well I’ll be. Eating rocks now?
FinalPush_2: What if I give it a try? I reckon I could have a go at this whole trackin’ thing.
FinalPush_4: *munch munch* This dirt is taking me north of here.
FinalPush_8: Like burnt dirt, with a tinge of north-east, which weirdly tastes like banana cookies. I actually just might be hungry.
CaveFound_2: I still have a bad taste in my mouth.
CaveFound_6: Quit your worryin’, I’ve got a lantern with me and my pistol.
TheCave_3: Don't turn tail now. Pretend you're out in the Frontier hiding snacks from a certain someone.
CaveExplore_1: Hmm… Hazel, which way do you think?
CaveExplore_3: I guess I'll flip a coin.
UndergroundChaos3_3: We’re trying to find the source of the Bloons, Scout, not run away from them! Come on.
Underground_1: Found it! Bring it on, Bloons!
AClueFromThePast_1: That was a close one. Everyone alright?
AClueFromThePast3_6: We should head straight back to Sandytown and report this to Mr Mayor. I'll fill you in then, too.
AClueFromThePast6_1: There's some light coming from that direction. Maybe there's a quicker way out?
Shortcut_1: Hey, there's a ladder here? That seems useful!
TownSinkhole_2: This isn’t good. Let’s find Mr Mayor.
ThreatReveal_3: I am now. We need to talk.
ThreatReveal2_1: This is a more serious place?
ThreatReveal2_3: Well, to put it simply, as I was helpin’ others out, it led us to this cave.
ThreatReveal2_4: While we were down there, we saw something unnatural. The worst bit is, it led right to the sinkhole here in Sandytown.
ThreatReveal3_1: Those weird tracks at the bottom of the pit? Those were the same tracks I saw at a town I used to live in. We didn't last more than a few months after we spotted those.
ThreatReveal3_3: Well, whatever made those tracks went for our supplies first.
ScoutEastGate_3: Sure sounds worth takin’ a look.
FarmSaved2_2: By the look of ‘im, he’s probably fielded worse.
GreatOakVillage_2: That’s right, an' it’s a mighty nice spot you got here.
GreatOakVillage_5: I guess hidden and forgotten ain’t easy to find.
TalkToDevinah_2: Rarin’ to go. But hey, what's past those barricades?
TalkToDevinah_5: Whoa! That gust went straight to my bones!
StillMoreToGo_6: Hate to break up the architecture symposium, but that wasn’t the last of them!
RingleaderThreatCleared_2: Ya know, you’d get along real well with a leaf lovin’ friend of mine.
StartJourneyToAncientForest_2: I must admit, all this talk about forgotten forests has me curious.
DownstreamNext_1: These Bloons have a real grip on this part of the Forest.
MonkeyMeadowsCleared_1: That was tricky! But the hairs on my neck ain’t standin’ anymore, so I think the meadow is clear. How ya feelin’ Dev?
NewBloons_3: It sure does look magical, and ancient. There’s a powerful quiet here.
NewBloons2_1: Wait for us! We need to follow her.
BalanceNext_2: But those tunnels change everything, and where Monkeys go, Bloons go.
EnchantedGladeNext_2: There’s an awful lot of trees here Devinah, you’ll have to be more specific.
HeartOfTheForest_2: More than welcome. Only thing is I don’t see any caves or sinkholes around here.
HeartOfTheForest_10: I reckon there’s only one way to find out.
HeartOfTheForest2_2: I’ll check our provisions, then meet you there.
SureIsSpooky_1: It is a might bit spooky in here.
SureIsSpooky_5: Don’t fret. I’m sure it’s nothin’.
GGhosts_2: I hear ya, partner, but this is important. Now stand tall, ghosts ain’t real!
GGhosts3_3: Devinah’s yarn is gettin’ the better of you is all.
GGhosts4_4: It’s not over yet, Scout, stay calm!
WhatARelief_2: An' now we know where the ghost stories came from. Devinah will get a laugh out of that.
WhatARelief_4: Getting through here might not be so bad after all!
WhatsSoFunny2_2: Now we’re spookin’ ourselves. Come on, stay sharp. There’s still more of those Glass Bloons around.
SickOfThisPlace_2: Me too, but if there’s a clue about the tunnels, we need to find it.
TheDeepSwamp_1: This campfire doesn’t look too overgrown.
TheDeepSwamp_3: Maybe. No sign of tunnels though. We should keep looking.
TheDeepSwamp_5: We need to keep going, even if we’re scared. Pretty much the definition of bravery.
CreepyMansion_1: Whoa, what’s an old Mansion doing out here in the middle of a forest? Devinah didn’t say anything about this.
ShesFriendly_4: Listen, if you really are a friend, can you answer a question of ours?
ShesFriendly_6: Have you seen a tunnel around here? One with lots of Bloons coming out of it?
ShesFriendly_11: Come on, Scout, she’s the best lead we’ve got.
EntranceToACavern_2: Devinah was right. And this is the spittin’ image of the other caves.
EntranceToACavern_5: Then let’s deal with ‘em quick as we can.
ACuriousGrave3_1: Here lies our fearless hero. Styx, savior of the Town of Midnight.
ACuriousGrave3_2: The date’s from over a hundred years ago.
ACuriousGrave3_4: Wonder why she was lookin’ at it?
ACuriousGrave3_5: Anyhow, I’m not sure where our mysterious helper disappeared to, but we’d best take a look at this cave.
TheTunnel3_4: Hard to forget. I never saw anything. But I did hear it. The ground shook. There was a roar, then the earth just opened up, like a mouth swallowin’ everything above it.
TheTunnel3_8: No harm done. In fact, it helps.
TheTunnel3_9: When I was alone on the Frontier, I could only play it over and over in my mind. Talkin’ about it, though, is helpin’ me see it more clearly. So thank you, Scout.
TheTunnel5_3: All it says is, "Thanks, it was fun."
TheTunnel5_12: You are full of surprises, Scout. You were scared as a possum back there, but you meet a real ghost, and your laughin' your head off.
TheTunnel8_6: Well, I’m always up for a good mosey along the beach.
MayorOffersToHelp2_3: Following the tunnel clues. What are you doing all the way out here?
MayorOffersToHelp3_1: I’d say ‘no thanks’, but I know he’ll just keep running.
MayorLocked_6: Learning more every day, it seems.
MayorLocked2_1: Oh, no it’s fine Mr Mayor you really don’t have to. Really.
MayorLocked2_6: Thanks, Mr Mayor. I, uh, hope you get out of your house shortly.
MayorLocked2_9: Best of luck, Dirk. We’ll be movin’ on.
AtTheCoast_2: No settlin’ for now. We should start lookin’ around.
MermonkeysAreReal_2: A Mermonkey!? I thought they were just a myth.
MermonkeysAreReal3_3: I think I might just be seeing stuff.
Maria_2: I did, and it makes me think we might be out of our depth.
Maria_6: So am I, but I can’t hold my breath that long! But maybe we don’t have to. There’s a boat over yonder.
RideMaria_1: There’s something etched on the side. It says ‘Maria’.
RideMaria_3: That makes a lot more sense.
RideMaria_5: Off to the deep blue we go!
SpiceIslandsNext_1: Looky here. Mr Mayor must've left his Water Pistol on Maria.
SpiceIslandsNext_3: And it's under attack! If we want ‘em to be more than just a story, we need to go!
WaitComeBack3_2: What do I know about Mermonkeys? Sure looked on edge, though. Maybe we can follow ’em from a distance?
WaitComeBack3_4: It looks like they headed up that platform yonder. Let’s head that way.
MoreRetributionBloons2_2: Didn’t think I’d ever see a Mermonkey, let alone try savin’ one. Let’s go!
DidntNeedHelp_5: All we want to know is if you’ve seen an unnatural tunnel around here, maybe the source of a passel of new Bloons? If it’s underwater you might be the only one to have seen it.
DidntNeedHelp_13: Please, this is important. We need to put a stop to the damage this thing can do.
DidntNeedHelp_17: Your home? That tunnel is that close to where you live?
DidntNeedHelp_20: Same here. We only need to know the tunnel’s whereabouts, then we’ll leave you alone.
WhatMermonkeys_5: Hey, Scout, perhaps a bit more scoutin’ and a bit less askin’.
Peninsula_3: Don’t worry about us - we’ll give ‘em what for.
FightsNotOverYet_4: I’m glad to hear it, but looks like there’s more trouble up ahead.
ProtectMermonkeyHome_2: You said it. But I do have to add 'fighting alongside a Mermonkey' to the list of things I’m strugglin’ to believe is real.
ProtectMermonkeyHome_5: Scout, play twenty questions later, would ya? We have to focus. Where to now, Khai?
ProtectMermonkeyHome_8: ‘Focus’ is that word we just mentioned.
LuminousCoveNext_2: We have to be part of this!
HeresTheTunnel_2: Whew, this tunnel is way too close.
HeresTheTunnel_4: It won’t come to that, we’ll put a stop to whatever's causing this.
HeresTheTunnel2_7: There was a secret shortcut the whole time?
ClearingTheWay2_1: Mermonkey magic? That looked like dynamite.
ClearingTheWay2_3: Thanks Khai, this will be much faster!
WhereToNext2_2: Don’t you go burnin’ yourself now!
WhereToNext2_4: Sounds good, I’ll see you soon!
MountainPath_3: I’m going to be in such good shape after all this traversing! Lead the way!
MountainPathBlocked_2: Is there any other way up?
MountainPathBlocked2_7: Hang on, Scout. He might be able to tell us who the mountain guide is.
MountainPathBlocked3_1: Hey, would you know where we can find the mountain guide?
MountainPathBlocked3_3: I ASKED IF YOU KNOW WHERE WE CAN FIND THE MOUNTAIN GUIDE!
MountainPathBlocked3_10: WE WERE JUST SAYIN’ WE’D REALLY APPRECIATE IT!
ContinueUpTheMountain_3: Nothin’ wrong with bein’ a little unhinged.
ContinueUpTheMountain3_1: WAS THAT NECESSARY!? THE PATH’S ALREADY OPEN!
AlpineRunNext_2: THANKS! SOUNDS LIKE WE ALSO NEED TO CHECK OUT ALPINE RUN! YOU GO ON AHEAD!
AlpineRunNext2_1: ARE YOU COLLECTING ANY USEFUL… sorry. Are you collecting useful information?
GoinUp_5: Which means there’ll definitely be a tunnel around here.
PostSkates_2: Mine too, I’ll never be able to talk to another Monkey ever again at this rate.
PostFrozen_2: Rocko already ran off. We need to catch up.
DarkPath2_1: I feel like I got into the wrong profession. Blowin’ stuff up all the time seems pretty fun.
ToGlacialTrail3_1: Didn’t realize blowin’ up some rocks was a blessing.
ErosionNext_3: Sounds like our best lead. There's too many crevasses up here, we could get lost if we went around checkin’ all of them.
WheresThisTunnel_2: Still no sign of a tunnel though.
WheresThisTunnel_4: I SAID THERE’S NO SIGN OF THE TUNNEL WE’RE LOOKING FOR!
WheresThisTunnel3_1: You a fan of his explosions now, Scout?
BellyOfTheBeast3_2: Good thing we got a guide, eh Scout?
TheLostCrevasse2_1: I guess we should follow him. The walls here feel quite fragile, and loud mouth over there isn’t the most subtle Monkey we’ve ever met.
ThreatGrowsNear3_1: It’s okay Scout. Did you get all the notes?
ThreatGrowsNear3_3: Alright, we should get out of here before any more Bloons decide to show up.
OutsideAgain_4: You’re alright Scout, we made it in one piece.
OutsideAgain_5: By the way Rocko. Oh right.
OutsideAgain_6: HEY, ROCKO! THANKS FOR HELPIN’ US!
EndOfActThree_14: Sounds good. I’ll get ready and see you there.
JourneyToTemple2_3: You met them last night? And you thought that was a good idea to give them the keys to your house?
TheTemple_4: Forward’s the best way to get anywhere, let’s go.
InsideTheTemple_5: Get ready everyone! This thing looks angry!
NotStoppingHere_2: And that tunnel leads back to Sandytown!
NotStoppingHere_4: Here’s the plan. Scout and I will try to cut it off. Dirk, Hazel, you two go back to Sandytown with the Mayor. Stand guard in case it gets there before we can.
ThroughMountain_4: WE’RE GOING BACK TO THE TUNNEL IN LOST CREVASSE! CAN YOU HELP US?!
CrevasseReturn_4: We’ll have to save the proper reunions for later, get ready everyone!
OnItsTail2_6: KEEP A LOOK OUT FOR US HERE ROCKO! IN CASE IT COMES BACK!
DevinahAtYourSide2_2: Everyone else as well, I don’t know if we could've done this alone.
BackUnderground_4: There’s no time! Come on, it’ll be headed straight to the cave under Sulfur Springs next. It could get to Sandytown before we know it!
BackUnderground_5: Thanks for your help Devinah. Please make sure Great Oak Village is safe.
WeDidIt3_3: That’s right, Dirk. It was all you.
WeDidIt7_2: Strange. I have mixed feelings, but I’m glad the Diamondback is gone for good.
WeDidIt7_4: And I’d probably still be wandering the Frontier!
WeDidIt8_2: Always happy to pop one back with ya, partner.
MayorDialogue3: You trying to become the Mayor? Too bad, that's me!
MayorDialogue4: Welcome to my town! Mine... Not yours
AmbushInSandyTown2_1: Why won't they leave us ALONE?!
AmbushInSandyTown3_2: Well, I was just having a tasty snack I found under this barrel, when I saw some Bloons break past the barricades! They’re somewhere in town!
AmbushInSandyTown3_4: This isn't the time to be arguing over the custody chain of snacks! We’re under attack!
AmbushInSandyTown3_6: Ah! Yes! All of us, yes! Oh! I think I saw a Bloon over there! I’ll go take care of that one!
TownIsSaved2_1: That was -munch munch- incredible! -munch munch- AMAZ -munch- ING!
TownIsSaved2_6: Ah! Straight to business, you must have seen our ads. Bold to presume you can just take the job without even asking!
TownIsSaved2_7: But I like your style - very direct. You’re hired!
TownIsSaved2_9: Ha, ha, and a charming sense of humor as well! Charisma and leadership, what a find! Come on, Sheriff. Let me show you your new lodgings.
TownIsSaved3_1: Sheriff Sheriff, haha. That kid is funny.
LeftBehind_1: Ah! Look here everyone! The new Sheriff I just hired, isn't he wonderful? I told you those ads I spent all our crop money on was worth it.
LeftBehind_2: These genius budgetary moves are why you should all keep voting for me!
LeftBehind_5: Hoo hoo! Ah, right on time, Sheriff Sheriff! Here's your vacant homestead that belonged to the previous Sheriff, who left completely unharmed and of his own accord!
LeftBehind_6: I heard it mentioned that he felt bored because this town was too safe.
LeftBehind_8: No, please, no rumors based on false hearings. The word he kept using was blessed.
LeftBehind_10: Inside you'll find just enough space for you and your posse! You can change your outfit, select a critter companion, or rest up after a scuffle. This very Homestead is the best and fastest place to recover any lost Stamina.
LeftBehind_11: Go on in and check it out, don’t be shy! I think the old Sheriff left one of his hats behind. Being so kind and generous, I think you should have it for helping us with that little.. uh.. incident earlier!
LeftBehind_13: Oh, you must see the Saloon!
TheSaloon_1: Ah, Sandytown's Saloon! We get visitors from all over coming here to taste our famous cactus juice.
TheSaloon_2: The Saloon is the place to find Bloon-popping comrades, if you’ve got enough Bananite to make it worth their while, that is!
TheSaloon_4: OH OH OH! You NEED to see the general store!! It has so much stuff, all at occasionally reasonable prices!!
TheSaloon_6: I do like to listen, thank you for noticing! Now do follow along.
TheGeneralStore_1: This is where I procured this very hat just last week! Special Mayors discount for me, of course, but you'll get the everyday low, low normal price.
TheGeneralStore_3: Of course you can! The whole town runs on Bananite. Spend it wisely and freely!
TheGeneralStore_5: Oh boy, would you look at the sun! I’ve got my daily barrel inspection! Why don't you explore around town and meet me at my house later? I have an extra special task for you to really earn your keep!
WatersOfSandytown_1: Sheriff! How are things getting on!
WatersOfSandytown_3: That's good to hear. So as for that task! I've been personally asked to help with a fish population study by the Monkey Knowledge Society. For every fish I catch or inspire the catching of, I get a small compensation!
WatersOfSandytown_5: Precisely! I’ll even split the reward with you fifty fifty! Even though I’m doing most of the work. Cataloguing is very strenuous, you know.
WatersOfSandytown_6: Head down to the fishing spot on the edge of town and try out this rod I found laying by the shoreline. Almost as if it was left there by some unsung benefactor who knew you'd need it. The world is so mysterious and wonderful!
WatersOfSandytown_8: This is, um, a test! I just want to make sure you're able to survive out in the Frontier!
FishingDone_1: Did you find the fishing hole? All I’ve fished up was a Bloonchipper. What a hunk of junk! You know what, you can keep that rod, for the good of Monkey Knowledge!
FishingDone2_2: Oh, would you look at the time! I have urgent barrel inspections to perform. Good luck, {SHERIFF_NAME}!
BazaarTradingPost_2: Just let me enjoy my day off at this exotic locale, you pesky Bloons!
ResortSaved_2: What a relief! Thank you {SHERIFF_NAME}! I could've dealt with them myself of course, but you should never work on your day off!
ResortSaved_5: I would invite you to stay at this delightful resort with me, but you seem far too busy! You've earned a Deputy Badge {SHERIFF_NAME}! Good luck!
ThreatReveal_2: Ah, my boy! Entirely immersed in the new role, are we?
ThreatReveal_4: Ah, a serious conversation is it? Let’s go talk somewhere more serious then.
ThreatReveal2_5: The sinkhole? We put a fence around that ages ago! No need to worry about that.
ThreatReveal3_2: Coincidence! Sandytown is perfectly safe! You saw the ads!
ThreatReveal3_4: No! NOT THE BARRELS!!! There's precious cargo in there! Delicious, delicious, precious cargo.
ThreatReveal3_6: Splendid plan! I was just about to suggest that myself!
MayorOffersToHelp2_2: Boys! So good to see you! What are you doing all the way out here?
MayorOffersToHelp2_4: Oh! Yes! I’d forgotten all about that! I hired Dirk to escort me out to my Vacation home. I needed to collect more salt for my famous salted sage cookies!
MayorOffersToHelp2_5: Say, while you’re here I’ll give you a taste! I haven’t been here in many months but I made extras last time I was here. They’re still in the storage container in the house, just you wait!
MayorLocked_2: I’ve given it some thought, my friends, and now that I’ve come all this way I think I’ll accompany you on your travels! Where are we headed?
MayorLocked_4: Marvelous!!! You know me and the Coast go way back! When I was a younger Monkey I used to travel all over the sea with Maria, hoo hoo!
MayorLocked_7: Ahhh, you should’ve seen it! Just us and the deepest blues.
MayorLocked_8: I’ll quickly grab my coat and be right with you! Dirk you can head off now, us heroes are off on an adventure!
MayorLocked2_3: It seems I’ve somehow locked myself inside.
MayorLocked2_5: Best you go on ahead without me. I’ll catch up as soon as I can!
MayorLocked2_7: Yes, yes, I’ll be right behind you! Dirk, I am in need of your services again!
MayorLocked2_10: Oh, Dirk, buddy! This lock is really stuck! We might be here a while!
EndOfActThree_1: Hello, fellow adventurers! Sorry about that incident earlier. Good thing is that it only took Dirk two days to get that lock unstuck! What a nice fella, did it all for free, too!
EndOfActThree_3: He said he was going back up to Sunset Gulch. Something about “Feeling sorry for me” and saying I was a “goofball” whatever all that means!
EndOfActThree_4: Anyway, how did your travels go? I’m sure you missed my fighting expertise on your journey!
EndOfActThree_11: Dirk’s up that way! I think I’ll go find him now. We became close friends stuck on that beach together you know, he must miss me!
JourneyToTemple_3: I also got to tell my new best friend how much I missed him!
JourneyToTemple2_2: Oh a few people I met at the Saloon last night said they'd watch all my stuff. They pinky swore to take care of it all!
JourneyToTemple2_4: Oh, don’t be so skeptical {SHERIFF_NAME}. They pinky swore!
TempleOverlook_4: This is, um, quite high up! I didn’t know that you could be this far from the rest of the ground. Perhaps we should move on.
TheTemple_2: Oh there sure are a lot of them. You know what? I’m going to stand guard here! Yes! Guard the way back!
EnterTheTemple_3: Oh I just remembered, I forgot to douse my fireplace before I left!
EnterTheTemple_5: Oh! Yes, that’s right. I guess I can stay. I’ll cover the entrance!
FinalStand2_1: Hey! You stay away from my barrels! I already lost most of my stuff yesterday in an unforeseeable home invasion, and I’m not about to lose anything else!
WeDidIt3_1: I’ll say that was some mighty fine Bloon wrangling from everyone!
WeDidIt3_4: Thanks to you all, our lovely Sandytown is in one piece!
WeDidIt3_5: And a very special thanks to our Sheriff! Who I found to save our Sandytown. In honor of him, I’m starting a new family tradition called Nominative Determinism!
WeDidIt3_6: I’d say this calls for a full round of cactus juice, ON THE HOUSE!
WeDidIt4_1: AND THEN I SAID, THAT’S NOT A DART MONKEY, THAT’S A DART FISH!
MonkeyFound_1: Get back! This dart is razor sharp!
Surprised_1: I’m not scared of you! Take that!
Surprised2_1: Hey now, I didn’t really mean to throw a dart at you, just a slip of the wrist you know? Haha!
Surprised3_3: Oh boy, where do I start?!
Surprised3_4: So our Mayor’s had a real sweet tooth for banana cookies lately, but he's eating everyone else's cookies!
Surprised3_5: I tried to hide them but Mr Mayor's nearly as good a scout as me! So I've started hiding mine out here.
Surprised3_6: I came to check on 'em, but before I knew it, it got dark! And, well, you saw the rest.
Surprised3_7: I know we just met, but you wouldn’t mind walking me back to Sandytown would you? I only had that one dart with me.
Surprised3_9: Thank you, stranger. It's just south of here, we can get to it by following the trail.
BlockedPath_1: Oh no, the trail’s blocked! It wasn't like this when I came out here.
BlockedPath_3: No, this is the only way through. The rocks look like they’ve been blasted loose.
BlockedPath2_1: Ah! It must've been Dynamite Bloons!
BlockedPath2_3: You don’t know?  They've been showing up in droves around here. They’re not like regular Bloons either, they explode after being hit!
BlockedPath2_6: Ooh, good idea! I’ll, uh, take cover.
BlockedPath4_3: Let’s get movin’ before any more turn up.
AmbushInSandyTown_2: I didn’t realise I’d been out so long, the sun’s already coming up.
AmbushInSandyTown_3: Thanks for getting me outta there. I still can’t believe that Bloon stole my snack.
AmbushInSandyTown_5: Well, I should probably get going. I have a lot to do today!
AmbushInSandyTown_7: Sure thing. Got some just over yonder.
AmbushInSandyTown_9: Whoa! That sounded like Mr Mayor!
AmbushInSandyTown4_3: Hey! Get your grubby hands off those!! They’re spoken for!
TownIsSaved3_3: I think you got a job. Cookie…?
LeftBehind_4: What did he say about our crop money?
LeftBehind2_3: Oh, and before I forget. Here's your new badge!
FishingDone2_1: Hey, my fishing rod! Where did you find it?
FishingDone3_1: Ah, I see the Mayor put you up to it. It’s fine, you can keep it. I can tell you’ll get good use out of it.
FishingDone3_3: He can be a lot, but he means well.
FishingDone3_4: By the way, a friend of mine told me at the Saloon last night there was some trouble brewing in Boulder Falls.
FishingDone3_5: Could you come and meet me up by the north entrance of town past the Saloon?
FirstAssignment_3: Lots of them in Boulder Falls. I'll remove the barricade. Follow me!
DirkQuickshot_1: It's right up the trail from here. My friend should be here any minute.
DirkQuickshot2_4: Dirk’s one of the sharpest shots around. At least that's what he said over a few cactus juices.
DirkQuickshot2_7: You two have this all sorted, I’ll leave you to it!
ClearedTheRidge_1: Whoa, you two cleared this place out in no time!
ClearedTheRidge2_1: And what will the spotlight do without him? Anyway, now that it's just us, I was hoping to ask you something.
ClearedTheRidge2_3: I was headed up to Sunset Gulch myself, as there’s somethin' I need to look into. I was wonderin’ if you’d meet me there, since, well, you're good at keepin' me outta trouble.
ClearedTheRidge2_4: Might be worth heading back to Sandytown and checking if any new Monkeys are in the Saloon. Making more friends helps a lot with all this fighting.
ClearedTheRidge2_6: I'm glad he’s on our side! Well, mostly glad. See ya up there!
OldRailroad_4: Listen, can you two cover me for a bit? There’s something I need to check at the edge of the Gulch.
OldRailroad_6: Alrighty then you two, let’s get going!
ALittleFurther_2: Not really. I was hoping I might find something like a source, a place they might be coming from.
FindAnything2_2: No. I can only tell the vague direction they came from, but nothin’ else.
FindAnything2_6: She's a Beast Handler. Great tracking skills.
FindAnything2_9: You’re right, I can’t believe I didn’t think of that!
FindAnything3_1: He likes the sound of his own name, but he’s good at what he does.
FindAnything3_3: Let’s head back down the ridge. Hazel sometimes hangs out near the Trading Post, so we should check there first.
ToColorfulTown_1: It's just across the river here! Be careful on the rocks, they’re slippery.
ToColorfulTown_3: Oh, heck, that's Mr Mayor! Let's giddy up!
BazaarTradingPost_1: There's Bloons attacking the Trading Post, we must've missed some!
ResortSaved_3: I asked around, but Hazel isn’t here anymore. Apparently she was headed towards Sulfur Springs though, so let’s head that way.
ResortSaved_4: We need to pass through Sandytown to get there, so it'd be a good time to stock up on supplies if you need any.
BloonTracking_1: Is a tumbleweed still a tumbleweed if it’s not tumbling?
BloonTracking_3: I think you’re onto something there.
BloonTracking4_2: We’ll be more careful of haphazard leaf steppin’ in the future! Sorry to bother, Hazel. This is {SHERIFF_NAME}, the new Sheriff. We could use your help.
BloonTracking4_3: You see, Sandytown’s been having trouble with a bunch of Dynamite Bloons, and we reckon they might be coming from somewhere around here. We figured you’d be the one to talk to.
BloonTracking4_5: Hazel, could you take us there?
Streambed_2: Ah what! Did I nearly step on a leaf again?
HazelTracking3_4: Maybe I'd be a better tracker if I ate dirt from time to time.
HazelTracking3_6: A few more of those and your name might’ve been Tracker!
APattern3_1: Her digestive tract is either perfect, or the worst in Monkey history. I’m not betting on which.
FinalPush_7: Well, glad you learned that lesson instead of me. I was about to do the same thing. How'd it taste?
CaveFound_5: I’ll, uh, move the barricade. Is this a bad time to mention I'm not fond of caves?
TheCave_2: You know, maybe we should head back up just to make sure we're in the right place.
TheCave_4: That actually makes me feel better, and simultaneously frustrated. Thanks, {SHERIFF_NAME}.
CaveExplore2_2: I don't know what's scarier, following a rock-eating Beast Handler or a Monkey who makes choices by flipping a coin. All in the dark.
UndergroundChaos_1: Why did it have to be in a cave? I can’t see a thing!
UndergroundChaos2_3: What rock? There's thousands of rocks!

AClueFromThePast3_3: If Bloons are coming through here, it won’t be safe to follow it. We should get out of here before any more show up.
AClueFromThePast5_1: Every Monkey to their own I guess.
AClueFromThePast6_2: Quicker way out sounds good to me!
TownSinkhole_1: Wait a minute, that tunnel leads here?
TownSinkhole2_1: Normally I’d check his house, but there are some barrels just up here.
ThreatReveal3_5: Now you mention it, a newcomer in the Saloon the other day was rattlin’ on about supply raids in Oak Valley. Maybe we should head through Furlong Fields and see if it's related.
ThreatReveal3_7: While we’re gone, can you wrangle up the townsfolk and make sure all the barricades are shored up?
ThreatReveal4_1: Let's head out soon as you’re ready. I’ll meet you by the east exit, towards Wagon’s Way.
ScoutEastGate_1: Howdy, {SHERIFF_NAME}! Hope you got some rest.
ScoutEastGate_2: I’ve organised to meet with Devinah along Wagon’s Way. She sent word that matched our situation so I reckon she’ll be able to help us find out more.
ScoutEastGate_4: I’ll move the barricade and we can get going.
CoveredGardenNext_2: Why didn’t I bring my duster?!
StillMoreToGo_4: In hindsight, the rotating hole in the roof might leave ya occasionally exposed.

SpringSpringNext_5: Now that’s a Druid answer if I ever heard one!

MonkeyMeadowsCleared_5: A lightning tornado? Not anywhere near me I hope!
BalanceNext_3: And Druids are here for Druids.
HeartOfTheForest_12: Wait, you’re not coming with us?
HeartOfTheForest2_1: Guess we’d better get going as soon as you’re ready.
SureIsSpooky_2: No kiddin’ My hackles are full up.

GGhosts2_2: There! There! I just saw one!
GGhosts3_2: I’m tellin’ you it was there, Sheriff!
GGhosts4_3: I can’t believe this is how it ends! The ghosts of all those popped Bloons have finally come to enact their revenge!

WhatARelief_3: It is pretty funny in hindsight.

TheDeepSwamp_4: Can’t we stay here a little longer?
CreepyMansion_2: I don’t like it one little bit!
CreepyMansion2_1: I don’t hear anything anymore. Do you think it’s gone?
CreepyMansion3_2: Wh-who are you?! Wh-what do ya want with us?

ShesFriendly_3: And those were z-zombie Bloons you were controlling?
ArrivingAtTheCemetery_3: Can’t you say that less… creepily?
EntranceToACavern_3: Then hopefully we find out somethin’ about it.
ACuriousGrave3_3: I ain’t heard of the Town of Midnight before.
TheTunnel_1: There’s the tunnel! I’ll jot down some notes.
TheTunnel3_1: Hey, {SHERIFF_NAME}. I’ve been meanin’ to ask.
TheTunnel3_3: About the first tunnel, and your town. Anything else you remember?
TheTunnel3_6: I’m sorry I made you recollect that. It’s just, we need to know as much as we can.
TheTunnel3_7: It’s pretty scary to think how big this thing might be, and whether we can do anything about it.
TheTunnel4_2: WAH! How did you do that?!
TheTunnel5_1: WAH! It’s just as scary when she disappears!
TheTunnel5_13: Yep. Turns out ghosts ain't THAT scary. Some of 'em are downright helpful. Or just made of glass!
TheTunnel7_3: Well, that's probably all the laughin’ this haunted tunnel in the Swamp can handle. Let me figure this out.
TheTunnel8_5: Based on the tunnels we’ve seen and where they seem to be headin’, I would say we should look at the The Coast next.
TheTunnel8_7: Let’s go back to the Swamp campfire, we can head out from there.
CoastDestination_1: I’m all set for supplies, {SHERIFF_NAME}, but feel free to head back to Sandytown if you need. Meet me at the barricades south of here, past Ancient Portal when you’re ready.
MayorOffersToHelp_1: If we follow this path we can get to the Coast. Wait, what are they doing here?
MayorOffersToHelp3_3: He does talk a lot, but he’s always high energy, ya know? What I wouldn’t give to be a happy chappy in my own little world like that.
MayorLocked_3: The clues are pushing us toward The Coast, so we were headin’ that way.
AtTheCoast_1: Wow, it’s really pretty here. The kinda place you could settle down.
MermonkeysAreReal_1: Wait. Look there! Am I seeing things!? Is that a…?
MermonkeysAreReal3_2: That’s amazing. I can’t believe it!
Maria_1: Hey, {SHERIFF_NAME}, did you notice the Bloons were coming from the water?
Maria_3: But the Bloons might not be. If the tunnels go deep enough, they could pass under the ocean.
Maria_5: Well, they are filled with air.
Maria_7: Wouldn’t it belong to someone, though? Are we pirates now?
RideMaria_2: Ohhh, Maria wasn’t Mr Mayor’s girlfriend, it was his boat’s name!
RideMaria_4: In that case I’m sure he wouldn’t mind us using it.
SpiceIslandsNext_2: These are the Spice Islands. I’ve heard about ‘em.
WaitComeBack2_5: Ah wait! We had a question about something important!
WaitComeBack3_1: A Mermonkey would be really helpful for finding an underwater tunnel. How can we get ‘em to listen?
MoreRetributionBloons_1: There they are. Oh, that’s no good.
MoreRetributionBloons2_1: That’s an awful lot of Bloons.
DidntNeedHelp_2: So what I believe you were trying to say is ‘thank you.’
DidntNeedHelp_11: Wait! Could you take us to the tunnel? Or tell us where it is? We need to find out more about it. Whatever it is, it’s troublin’ our town up north in the desert.
DidntNeedHelp_19: Well, I promise to keep it a secret!
WhatMermonkeys_2: Wait! I need to ask, can you really breathe underwater?
WhatMermonkeys_4: And is it true that you have sharp teeth?
WhatMermonkeys_6: Ah, you’re right. I’m just really excited.
ProtectMermonkeyHome_3: By the way, what kind of food do you eat? Do you like bananas?
ProtectMermonkeyHome_7: Your home? Wow! How long have you all lived there? Do you have houses? Is it all wet?
HeresTheTunnel2_1: Alright, I’ve taken all the notes I can. Thanks for trusting us Khai.
HeresTheTunnel2_5: Back to the Coast for starters. I reckon we have a long boat journey ahead of us.
HeresTheTunnel2_9: Oh, that makes sense! Mind if I ask you a few questions on the way…?
WhereToNext_1: Let me just dry off, that cove was so wet and damp.
WhereToNext2_1: Hot! Hot! Hot! I shouldn’t have stood so close!
WhereToNext2_3: Whew! That’s better. I’m going to look at my notes down by the water. Head back to Sandytown if you need to and meet me back near the boat dock later.
MountainPath_2: Howdy, {SHERIFF_NAME}. I think we’ll need to head to Frozen Peak. It’s quite a climb but there’s a mountain guide who can help us get up there.
MountainPathBlocked_3: No, this is the only way. How’re we supposed to get up there now?
MountainPathBlocked2_2: What’s wrong with you? You almost blew us up!
MountainPathBlocked2_4: Hey! Did you hear what I said!?
MountainPathBlocked2_6: How rude! We don’t have time for this, let’s go {SHERIFF_NAME}, the trail’s clear now.
MountainPathBlocked2_8: If you wanna ask him, be my guest.
MountainPathBlocked3_8: It just can’t be!! This guy!?
DiamondInTheRough_4: At least if you’re here, we could sneak around ’em.
ContinueUpTheMountain_2: Are you sure this is a good idea? This guy seems unhinged.
AlpineRunNext2_2: Sure am! Let’s head up and meet with Rocko. It seems too quiet now.
GoinUp_2: WHY ARE YOU BLOWING EVERYTHING UP!?
MountainResort_1: Looks like it hasn’t been used in… ever?
MountainResort_3: Yeah, I wonder why… oh wait! It’s freezing!
PostFrozen_1: That seems to be the last of them, at least in the main field anyway.
PostFrozen_3: He went back the way we came.
DarkPath2_2: It’s clear now, but lookin’ at it I wish it wasn’t.
ToGlacialTrail3_2: Who knew! We should do that more often!
ErosionNext_2: Rocko reckons there’s a part of the glacier that seems to be eroding faster than the others. Maybe it means more Bloon activity?
WheresThisTunnel_1: Feels like we’re getting closer. Bloons being this far up the mountain doesn’t seem like a normal thing.
WheresThisTunnel2_2: I hadn’t even thought that the entrance could be covered in snow!

BellyOfTheBeast3_6: JUST FOLLOW US AND TRY NOT TO CAUSE A CAVE IN!

TheLostCrevasse2_2: Heh, you can say that again.
ThreatGrowsNear_1: This is definitely it! I’ll take note of the tunnel’s position quickly.
ThreatGrowsNear2_3: Oh could you BE QUIET FOR ONCE!?
ThreatGrowsNear3_2: Yeah, I’ve got everything I need.
OutsideAgain_3: Whew, that was a lot of Bloons, my legs won’t stop shaking!
OutsideAgain_8: Oh my poor ears. I’m ready to get back to warm and QUIET Sandytown!
EndOfActThree_6: We’ve got some news about the tunnel.
EndOfActThree_7: Given the direction the tunnel is goin’, from here under the Town Sinkhole, under Sulfur Springs, through the Swamp and then past Frozen Peak… it’s likely continuin’ north.
EndOfActThree_9: If I had to put money on it, I’d say it’s likely to be near The Temple.
EndOfActThree_12: {SHERIFF_NAME}, it’s probably good to gather any supplies you might need before we go. Feels like we might be about to enter the belly of the beast.
EndOfActThree_13: Remember that old train station at the north end of Sunset Gulch where we fought the Bloons with Dirk? I’ll meet you there.
JourneyToTemple_2: As I was heading up to Sunset Gulch I ran into Hazel. She’s offered to help us.
JourneyToTemple2_1: Hey Mr Mayor, if you’re here then who’s watching Sandytown?
JourneyToTemple2_5: Sorry to interrupt but it’s time we head off, we can deal with this issue later.
TempleOverlook_3: And look at all those Bloons!
TempleOverlook_6: Well, either what we’re after is down there, or Rocko decided to try excavating the desert for a change.
TheTemple_1: Looks like we’ll need to clear all the Bloons swarming the Temple first, then we can head inside.
EnterTheTemple_2: The Bloons do seem to be growing in number, we must be close to the source.
EnterTheTemple_6: Alright, let’s go before any more of us lose our nerve. Stay close everyone!
InsideTheTemple_1: Eek! Is th-that what I think it is!?
NotStoppingHere_7: Good plan, {SHERIFF_NAME}. Let’s see if we can cut it off back at Glacial Trail. Given the shape of the tunnel, that’ll be where it’s headed next.
NotStoppingHere_8: Meet me by the campfire on Glacial Trail as soon as you can! And good luck, Dirk, Hazel!
CrevasseReturn_9: I wouldn’t bother, he yells all the time. Your ears get used to it, eventually...
OnItsTail_2: But that means it’ll be headed to the Mermonkey’s Cove next!
OnItsTail2_3: We might be able to cut it off at the Swamp where that Crypt was, but we should also warn the villagers in Great Oak Village first!
OnItsTail2_5: WE DON’T HAVE TIME TO WAIT!
DevinahAtYourSide_3: We found what we were looking for, and it’s a ginormous Bloon critter headin’ straight for the Swamp!
DevinahAtYourSide_5: We came to warn you, there might be a lot of Bloons coming this way!
DevinahAtYourSide2_1: Whew, I feel better having Devinah join us.
DevinahAtYourSide3_2: We need to go to the Swamp.
BackUnderground_7: Let’s get to Sulfur Springs as soon as we can {SHERIFF_NAME}!
UndergroundBoss_3: It’s coming this way, an’ we need to cut it off! Do you remember the way through the cave Hazel?
EndOfTheRoad_3: On the ropes isn’t good enough! It’ll be headed right into Sandytown!
FinalStand6_3: Come on, Sheriff, let’s show these Bloons what Sandytown is made of!
WeDidIt7_3: Well, Sandytown will always be grateful you chose to stay when you did. There’s no telling what could have happened without you.
WeDidIt7_5: Regardless of what you choose to do now Sheriff, you’ll always have a home with us in Sandytown.
WeDidIt8_1: Well, I don’t know about you, but I could do with another cactus juice!
DirkQuickshot2_5: Let’s not talk about the other night - I’m still feeling a bit prickly. Anyway the Bloons are swarmin' the end of the trail, like somethin’s whipped ‘em up. Even I can’t take ‘em on my own. Whaddya say, {SHERIFF_NAME}?
FurtherOutbreaks_1: That ain't close to all of 'em, but at least the main road is clear. Nice shootin' out there.
FurtherOutbreaks2_1: Come on, more Bloons this way.
Campfire_1: Alright! That looks nice ‘n clear. Glad you could see me in action.
Campfire_3: Dirk the Berserk! Quarrelsome Quickshot! My name is known far and wide.
Campfire_6: There's a campfire not far from here, and what Monkey doesn’t love time 'round the campfire?
Campfire2_1: You can idle there to restore Stamina, or swap out Posse members low on Stamina with fresh Ranch Hands. The campfires out here even let you fast travel.
Campfire2_3: Somethin’ like that. Hey, I found this Dynamite Stick in a crate. You look like you need it more'n me. You can put it on at the Campfire. Follow 'long!
CampfireAmbush_2: Nah, don’t like tyin’ myself down anywhere, like the desert wind. But Sandytown treats me well, and the cactus juice always hits the spot, heh.
CampfireAmbush_7: Hah! Come back for another taste, did they? Momma always said going back for seconds is the best compliment you can give a Monkey!
CampfireAmbush_8: Hope you've got an appetite for hot lead!
AlongTheRidge_2: Strange though, I coulda sworn we cleared them all out from the main road.
AlongTheRidge_5: Over there! There's more of ‘em up along that ridge and down near the Bazaar trading post.
AlongTheRidge_6: I'll head over now, meet me there when you can!
BackAlongTheRidge_1: Yeehaw! What a team we make with you backing me up! They’re on the run now!
ClearedTheRidge_2: Sure did! Junior here is quite the Monkey!
ClearedTheRidge_4: That's no matter. They didn't stand a chance against Dirk the Daring and his new sidekick, {SHERIFF_NAME} the Sheriff!
ClearedTheRidge_5: Anyway, I must be off. I left something up at Sunset Gulch that needs tendin’ to. See ya!
OldRailroad_3: Howdy, {SHERIFF_NAME}. Good thing I came here when I did. Bunch of Bloons up here. Naturally I managed to single-handedly push 'em back up to the old railroad.
SunsetGulch_1: Alright, that's done. Let's see where Scout ran off to.
ALittleFurther_4: Well if it’s a source you're wantin’, I reckon we follow the fire!
FindAnything_1: Bullseye! Another notch for Dirk the Dangerous.
FindAnything2_3: Dagnabbit. There’s gotta be a way.
FindAnything2_4: Hey, you know Hazel, don’t ya Scout?
FindAnything2_7: Heh. Always scufflin' and scrabblin' 'round, eyes glued to the dirt. Good with animals though.
FindAnything2_8: I bet if there was even a hint of a trail, she'd be able to follow it.
FindAnything2_10: See you ‘round. If you ever need me, just give me a whistle.
MayorOffersToHelp3_2: Trust me I was hoping he’d run off on me. I’ve never met someone who talked so much.
MayorOffersToHelp3_4: Well, in any case, I need to follow him. I get paid by the dart, ya know, so hopefully there’s some Bloons on the way.
MayorLocked_1: You alright Mr Mayor? You’re lookin’ extra inspired.
JourneyToTemple_4: Oh yeah, overjoyed to see you too buddy ol’ pal.
TempleOverlook_7: Yeeeeeehaw!! Let’s get this rodeo on the road-eo!
TheTemple_3: What would we do without ya, buddy.
EnterTheTemple_1: Yeehaw! Now THAT was a good fight!
EnterTheTemple_4: I thought you had people watching your house. I’m sure they can handle it, right Mr Mayor?
InsideTheTemple_3: Don’t matter how big the Bloon is, I’ll take it down!
NotStoppingHere_6: An’ I can smell my legendary hero status already.
NotStoppingHere_11: Take this Peacepopper, you’ll get good use out of it.
NotStoppingHere_13: Now get outta here you two!
UndergroundBoss_2: If you two are here, then…
UndergroundBoss_5: Round two it is! Only way I’m goin’ down is with my guns blazin’!
EndOfTheRoad_2: Heh, I’d say we’ve got it on the ropes!
FinalStand3_1: Yeeeehaw! Get ready to eat lead ya rubbery rats!
WeDidIt3_2: Well naturally it was no match for me!
WeDidIt5_1: So you’re the famous Styx, foe of all Bloons?
WeDidIt5_3: Of course it’s only natural that two legends across time would meet like this! What advice would you give a fellow hero?
WeDidIt5_5: Heh, I knew you’d get it!
HazelDialogue2: A fine piece of gravel for my collection!
BloonTracking3_1: You should be careful, you almost stepped on that leaf.
BloonTracking4_1: See these tracks? Means some Aura bloons have been nearby. Round, floaty, sunny things, you know? I only know because of this leaf, and you almost stepped on it!
BloonTracking4_4: Well you've come to the right Monkey. I saw some Dynamite Bloon tracks not too long ago.
BloonTracking4_6: Yes, yes I can. Now let’s see which way they went.
BloonTracking5_2: Yes, it was this way. They were here only an hour ago. Follow me.
Streambed_3: No, the tracks continue through here, but we need to clear these Bloons first.
HazelTracking3_1: Mhm, I thought so. Bloons ahead, Dynamite Bloons, too.
HazelTracking3_3: Yes. The dust’s finer, as if swept over, and I tasted gunpowder.
HazelTracking4_1: There are more Bloons up ahead, we should be on our guard.
APattern2_1: Yes, they definitely went this way.
APattern2_2: Keep your eyes peeled, there's more Bloons up ahead.
FinalPush_1: Well, that was fun. Let me look around and see if I can keep following their tracks.
FinalPush_6: If you’d have looked down, there are scorch marks on the ground, clearly south! You don't always need to eat the dirt. Sometimes your eyes do the trick.
FinalPush_9: I guess you got it half right! You might have what it takes to be a tracker one day, {SHERIFF_NAME}.
CaveFound_3: This cave is pretty dark, you sure we want to head in?
TheCave_1: Sure is dark in here. I'm glad we've got your light, {SHERIFF_NAME}!
CaveExplore_2: Everything tastes the same down here.
UndergroundChaos2_2: Watch where you're going! You made me drop my rock!
UndergroundChaos2_4: Exactly. How am I supposed to find it now?
AClueFromThePast3_2: It's definitely not natural - I can taste it.
AClueFromThePast4_2: Certainly! Let me know if you need my help for-
JourneyToTemple_5: *Sniff sniff* the weird guy with the big hat smells like bananas and sugar.
TempleOverlook_2: *Sniff sniff* Something smells off about this place!
TheTemple_5: This dirt tastes even stranger. I’m not sure what we’re facing here but I don’t like it.
InsideTheTemple_4: It smells terrible! I bet it tastes terrible, too.
NotStoppingHere_5: I’ll be able to smell it a mile away!
NotStoppingHere_9: Take this pebble for good luck!
UndergroundBoss_4: Down, right, don’t go left yet, then go left, then don’t go left because that leads somewhere far away, and don’t go right at the… actually, after saying it out loud, it’ll just be easier if I lead the way.
FinalStand3_2: I’m gonna wipe out this bad smell!
Devinah_2: Ah, good to see you Scout, and it’s nice to meet you too, {SHERIFF_NAME}. Thank you both for coming.
Devinah_3: Scout may have told you, but I think we’re having similar issues in the valley to what you described.
Devinah_4: Considering what I know, I believe it’s coming from the Ancient Forest.
Devinah_6: It’s a forest lost to time, hidden upstream off a little pass in Monkey Meadows. I’ll accompany you both there.
Devinah_7: Just keep your wits about you. The main cause of disturbance for us have been the Ringleader Bloons, which whip up strong winds that protect them.
Devinah_9: Yes, of sorts. If we do encounter any, don’t let up your attacks. We should be able to get through them with persistent offense.
FurlongFields_1: Oh no! The Bloons invading Great Oak Village are here!
FurlongFields_2: We can’t pass by and do nothing. {SHERIFF_NAME}, Scout, can you help me save the farm?
FarmSaved_1: Whew, good to see you’re alright there, Farmer McWheaty.
FarmSaved2_1: He’s not much of a talker, but I can tell he’s relieved.
FarmSaved2_3: Indeed. Alright, let’s be on our way!
GreatOakVillage_1: Scout’s visited before, but I presume this is your first time in Great Oak Village, {SHERIFF_NAME}?
GreatOakVillage_3: Most of us are Druids in training, hence all the gardens.
GreatOakVillage_4: Make yourselves at home, and take a rest if you need it. The path ahead is substantial.
GreatOakVillage_6: Precisely. When you’re ready, meet me by the south fence.
TalkToDevinah_3: Ah, that would be the Swamp. Most Druids haven't been in there since-
TalkToDevinah_7: Quick! We need to protect the town!
CoveredGardenNext_1: I can feel the wind coming from the gardens!
StillMoreToGo_3: I will be. I know we can cultivate them again soon, but I wilt when I see our precious gardens attacked like this.
StillMoreToGo_5: Very true, but the thrilling chaos of that movement, focus and fresh air is worth it.
StillMoreToGo_7: As I was saying, focus is key. We need to get them clear of the village!
CornfieldNext_1: The damage to those hedges sorely needs tending, but no time now. We need to make sure our food supply is safe!
RingleaderThreatCleared_1: Thank you for your help. I hope one day we aren’t troubled by these Bloons, and the plants won’t need to struggle.
RingleaderThreatCleared_3: I do love a good leaf!
RingleaderThreatCleared_4: Now, the trail to the Ancient Forest leads west of here, but we’ll need to keep a sharp eye out for more Bloons along the way.
RingleaderThreatCleared_5: Meet me by the river crossing down the trail when you’re ready. If your Posse needs a rest, remember you can swap in fresh Ranch Hands at the Campfire.
MonkeyMeadowNext_3: I wasn’t going to mention that. I meant actual wind, coming from the Meadow.
DownstreamNext_3: I think they’re trying to make their way back to town, either reserves or reinforcements.
DownstreamNext_4: Hurry back and we can catch them!
SpringSpringNext_2: I think we’re safe to head onward now.
SpringSpringNext_6: Let’s continue on, and keep your wits about you. This is just the beginning.
MonkeyMeadowsCleared_2: It’s Devinah, and I agree. We’re nearly at the Ancient Forest, where the Druids draw much of their power.
MonkeyMeadowsCleared_4: Oh, many Druids express that talent. Wait until you see us conjure a lightning tornado!
MonkeyMeadowsCleared_6: You’ll be fine. So long as you don’t cross a Druid! Anyway, it’s just through here, follow me.
NewBloons_1: Here we are, this is the Ancient Forest!
NewBloons_2: They say fairies live here, and while I’ve never seen one myself, I do feel their presence.
NewBloons_4: The Grand Druid says this place is older than time itself.
NewBloons_6: More Bloons! We have to hurry!
BalanceNext_1: The Bloons have never been so close to the heart of the forest.
BalanceNext_4: The circle. They’ll be headed for the circle!
EnchantedGladeNext_1: We have to hurry! They’ll damage the tree!
EnchantedGladeNext_3: The Ancient Tree. This forest is perfectly balanced, and all of its energy is centered at the Ancient Tree at the top of the valley.
EnchantedGladeNext_4: We can’t let them harm it!
HeartOfTheForest_1: Thank you for helping protect the Ancient Tree.
HeartOfTheForest_3: I was thinking the same thing. Hrmm... in that case there’s likely only one other place they could have come from.
HeartOfTheForest_6: But the thing is, a while ago some Monkeys started saying they saw ghosts in the Swamp.
HeartOfTheForest_8: There were always a few Bloons there, but after the rumors started Monkeys stopped going and it became overrun. There are beautiful trees there, but our village is too far away to effectively protect them.
HeartOfTheForest_9: But now I wonder if it's got something to do with that tunnel you two found that’s brought all the new Bloons.
HeartOfTheForest_11: Please take care, and consider bringing others to aid you. I’m not sure how many Bloons might be in there.
HeartOfTheForest_13: I’m sorry, the village will need me to help restore the forest.
HeartOfTheForest_15: You’ll find the trail to the Swamp past the barricades you saw on the eastern side of Great Oak Village.
HeartOfTheForest_16: Good luck, and may the spirits of the forest guide you.
DevinahAtYourSide_6: Wait one moment. I’ll let the villagers know, but then I want to come with you to help.
DevinahAtYourSide3_1: Okay, they’re all preparing. Where to now?
DevinahAtYourSide3_3: Normally I’d say stay away, but this monster is the real threat. We can meet at the campfire in the Swamp.
HelpFromGrave_4: Then let’s send it on its way!
BackUnderground_1: It’s looking worn for wear at least.
FinalStand5_1: You will feel the wrath of the forest!
WeDidIt6_1: I see, so Mermonkeys care about the ocean in the same way we Druids feel about the forest.
WeDidIt6_3: Well, you’re always welcome in our grove. Now that the Diamondback’s gone, we’ll be able to nurture our gardens and forests to their former glory.
CreepyMansion3_3: A little while since Monkeys came here…
CreepyMansion3_5: No, you shouldn’t have brought all these Bloons to my doorstep. We need them gone.
ShesFriendly_7: A tunnel… yes, yes I have. A grave disturbance.
ShesFriendly_13: Watch out… more Bloons in here…
ArrivingAtTheCemetery_2: Hehee… it won’t be long now...
WeDidIt5_4: Hehehe… well first you need to consider your hero pose…
KhaiDialogue4: I swim laps around the Bloons
WaitComeBack2_4: I can outswim you any day, even in your reassembled tree craft, so don’t even try to catch me!
DidntNeedHelp_6: A tunnel? You mean you’re not…? I’m sorry, I thought you two were looking for something else.
DidntNeedHelp_7: You describe what I’ve been patrolling. A long stretched out tunnel right? As if something was digging?
DidntNeedHelp_9: Yes, it appeared not long ago, and there've been ground tremors too. I didn’t see the Bloons coming from there but they have increased in number.
DidntNeedHelp_10: If that’s all you need to know, I need to get this information to, uh, back as soon as possible.
DidntNeedHelp_12: I’m not sure if that’s possible. You say this extends up into the desert?
DidntNeedHelp_14: This threatens us all then. If I do this for you, both of you must promise me something.
DidntNeedHelp_16: Absolute secrecy. The location of my home must remain a secret!
DidntNeedHelp_18: Unfortunately, and it’s rattling our home to its foundations. I owe you one after you, I admit, assisted me earlier.
DidntNeedHelp_21: Alright, I’ll swim in front and lead the way, but you’d better keep up!
WhatMermonkeys_1: The tunnel isn’t far from here. Follow me up the cliff this way.
WhatMermonkeys_3: For as long as I want to, yes.
Peninsula_2: There’s so many of them! I need to go check on the other Mermonkeys. Can you handle the Bloons up here in the meantime?
Peninsula_4: I’ll come back and find you as soon as I can!
FightsNotOverYet_3: We rallied and our defenses held firm.
FightsNotOverYet_5: I’m always keen for another battle. Let us rout them together!
ProtectMermonkeyHome_4: I’ve never eaten one of your bananas, but we have lots of seananas.
ProtectMermonkeyHome_6: The tunnel is in the same cave as my home. This is where the sworn secrecy comes in.
LuminousCoveNext_1: They come no further! You Bloons will taste the true power of the sea!
MermonkeyHomeSaved_1: Thank you for helping us protect our home.
MermonkeyHomeSaved_2: Now I can show you the tunnel, this way.
HeresTheTunnel_3: We have Mermonkeys stationed here often and have always prevailed. But the size of these attacks are nearly overpowering.
HeresTheTunnel2_2: I trust you won’t make me regret that. Few Monkeys have seen this place, and even fewer welcomed as guests.
HeresTheTunnel2_6: Nonsense, I’ll open up a secret passage for you to use.
HeresTheTunnel2_8: We have them everywhere. How do you think we started the stories that we can be in multiple places at once?
ClearingTheWay_2: I’ll use some of my Mermonkey magic to clear these rocks!
ClearingTheWay2_2: Dynamite? What’s that? I can blow up rocks with just a small stick. Magic!
ClearingTheWay2_5: I’m sure we will. Good luck!
CrevasseReturn_2: I heard through the seavine you Monkeys might need help with this monster on the loose.
CrevasseReturn_5: The power of the ocean is on our side!
CrevasseReturn_7: You don't need to yell so loud, we’re right next to you!
OnItsTail_3: Don’t worry Scout, us Mermonkeys won’t let it harm the Cove. You go on ahead, see if you can cut it off further up!
FinalStand4_1: You’re no match for me, even in a desert!
WeDidIt6_4: If there’s a river somewhere nearby I’ll make sure to swim by and see them one day.
RockoDialogue2: IT'S A COAT BUT THANKS FOR NOTICING
RockoDialogue4: LET ME KNOW IF I NEED TO SPEAK LOUDER
MountainPathBlocked3_2: WHAT’S THAT? YOU’RE GONNA HAVE TO SPEAK UP.
MountainPathBlocked3_7: I CAN GETCHA UP THE MOUNTAIN FAST AS A FIDDLE.
MountainPathBlocked3_9: SORRY, YOU’LL HAVE TO SPEAK UP.
MountainPathBlocked3_11: YAHAHAHA. ALRIGHT THEN, TAKE THIS HAT AND FOLLOW ME!
DiamondInTheRough_1: HOW GOOD ARE YA FIGHTIN’ BLOONS?
DiamondInTheRough_3: GOOD TO HEAR. THERE’S SOME DIAMOND BLOONS UP AHEAD. YOU’LL NEED A LOTTA FIRE POWER TO BREAK ‘EM.
DiamondInTheRough_5: JUDGIN’ BY YOUR SILENCE, I’LL TAKE THAT AS YOU’RE REARIN’ TO GO. YAAAAHOOOO! BOOM! BOOM!
ContinueUpTheMountain_1: NOW THAT’S HOW YOU DO IT!
ContinueUpTheMountain_4: WHAT ARE YOU TWO LIPPIN’ ABOUT? GET THE ROCKS OUTTA YOUR SHOES AND LET’S GOOOOO.
ContinueUpTheMountain3_2: ALWAYS NECESSARY TO HAVE A LITTLE FUN. LET’S GO!
AtFrozenPeak_1: HERE WE ARE, THE FROZEN PEAK.
AtFrozenPeak_3: ANYTIME. HOW ABOUT WE HEAD OVER TO THIS PLACE CALLED MOON LANDING? IT JUST LOOKS THAT WAY, IT AIN’T ACTUALLY IN SPACE, DON’T YA WORRY.
AtFrozenPeak_4: THEN WE SHOULD CHECK IF THE BLOONS ARE UP ALPINE RUN.
GoinUp_3: HOW ELSE YA SUPPOSED TO TRAVERSE A MOUNTAIN? YAHAHAHA!
GoinUp_4: BESIDES, WE’VE HAD A LOT MORE RUBBLE PILIN’ UP THESE DAY. LOTS OF TREMORS.
GoinUp_9: WELL WE WERE. THERE’S TOO MUCH SNOW ON THE RIDGE ABOVE, WE'LL NEED TO FIND ANOTHER WAY ‘ROUND. FOLLOW ME, WE’LL GO ACROSS FROZEN PEAK.
GoinUp_10: WE CAN STOP AT THE RESORT ALONG THE WAY. SOAKIN’ YOUR FEET IN ICE WATER DOES WONDERS.
LastResort_1: NOT HERE TOO! HOW WILL I SOAK MY FEET NOW?
MountainResort_2: WE BUILT THIS RESORT THINKIN’ IT’D BE NICE AN’ POPULAR LIKE THE ONE NEAR THE BAZAAR TRADING POST. SOME REASON MONKEYS DON’T COME HERE MUCH THOUGH.
MountainResort_4: ONCE YOU’RE ALL WARMED UP AND RESTED WE NEED TO KEEP MOVIN’. WE NEED TO CLEAR A FEW MORE AREAS TO KEEP THE MOUNTAIN VILLAGE SAFE.
MountainResort_6: I CAN’T TELL YA, THEY’RE VERY PRIVATE! ALSO IT’S A VERY QUIET PLACE AN’ I’M NOT ALLOWED TO GO THERE ANYMORE FOR SOME REASON.
MountainResort_8: LET’S CLEAR THE FROZEN LAKE FIRST, THEN WE CAN HEAD OVER TO THE ICE RIVER.
PostSkates_1: MY THROAT IS STARTING TO HURT FROM ALL THIS TALKING. RIGHT, FOLLOW ME.
DarkPath_1: WE NEED TO GO THROUGH DARK PATH IF WE WANNA GET TO GLACIAL TRAIL, STAND BACK.
DarkPath2_3: HERE WE GO, THIS IS THE ONLY WAY.
ToGlacialTrail_1: WELL DONE. NO ONE’S BEEN UP HERE IN YEARS, SO EVEN I DUNNO WHAT IT LOOKS LIKE ANYMORE.
ToGlacialTrail_2: I’M GONNA BLOW UP THIS ROCK FOR GOOD LUCK.
ToGlacialTrail2_1: ALRIGHT, WE HAVE THE MOUNTAIN’S BLESSING NOW. WHEN YOU’RE READY MEET ME AT THE GLACIER.
WheresThisTunnel_3: WHAT’S THAT? I CAN’T HEAR WHATCHYA SAYIN’.
WheresThisTunnel2_1: DON’T KNOW ‘BOUT ANY TUNNELS, BUT THE SNOW'S HEAVY ‘ROUND HERE. MIGHT BE HIDING ONE.
WheresThisTunnel2_3: NOTHIN’ A FEW EXPLOSIONS CAN’T FIX. YAHAHAHAHA!
BellyOfTheBeast3_5: WHATCHA NEED ME TO DO NOW?
TheLostCrevasse_3: I’M GOING TO HEAD THIS WAY.
CrevasseBattle_1: FOUND THE BLOONS. LET’S TRY AND SNEAK UP ON THEM. UTILIZE THE ELEMENT OF SURPRISE.
OutsideAgain_1: WOOOOO! I HAVEN’T HAD THAT MUCH OF A BLAST SINCE…
OutsideAgain_7: WAS A PLEASURE TO HELP YA BOTH. YAHAHAHA!
ThroughMountain_3: YAHAHA! SHERIFF, SCOUT, GOOD TO SEE YA.
ThroughMountain_5: YOU WANT TO GO BACK THERE?
OnItsTail2_4: HOLD UP! MY LEGS AREN’T AS YOUNG AS THEY USED TO BE!
OnItsTail2_7: AYE, AYE! I’LL HOLD DOWN GLACIAL TRAIL FOR YOU.
FrontierNPCDialogue7: Mr Mayor sure knows how to run a town!
FrontierNPCDialogue8: It's good to get out of the house
NinjaNPCDialogue2: Did you try the cactus juice?
NinjaNPCDialogue3: It's a good day to be a Monkey!

TownIsSaved_7: Thanks for the help! Let's team up again.
SaveSandyTown_2: Hah, these Bloons aren’t getting through us!
TownIsSaved_1: Whew, that seems to be the last of them.
TownIsSaved_2: That was some nice Bloon wranglin' there!
TownIsSaved_5: Sounds like it’s time for a cold cactus juice at the Saloon!
LeftBehind_7: Didn’t he say he was stressed?
GetSoundtrackNow: Get the Soundtrack on Steam now!
